4869456Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class HashWrapperDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static string HashPasswordFromJScript(string password)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      string url = "https://mysite.com/DoHash.asp";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      string fields = "password=" + password;Di2015NewLine      HttpWebRequest request = (HttpWebRequest)WebRequest.Create(url);Di2015NewLine      request.ContentType = "application/x-www-form-urlencoded";Di2015NewLine      request.Method = "POST";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      using(Stream rs = request.GetRequestStream())Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        using (MemoryStream ms = new MemoryStream())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine          using(BinaryWriter bw = new BinaryWriter(ms))Di2015NewLine          {Di2015NewLine            bw.Write(Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(fields));Di2015NewLine            ms.WriteTo(rs);Di2015NewLine            ms.Flush();Di2015NewLine          }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      using(HttpWebResponse response = (HttpWebResponse)request.GetResponse())Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        if(response.StatusCode == HttpStatusCode.OK)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine          using(Stream rs = response.GetResponseStream())Di2015NewLine          {Di2015NewLine            using (StreamReader rr = new StreamReader(rs))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine              StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine              int bufferSize = 1024;Di2015NewLine              char[] read = new Char[bufferSize];Di2015NewLine              int count = rr.Read(read, 0, bufferSize);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine              while (count > 0)Di2015NewLine              {Di2015NewLine                sb.Append(read, 0, count);Di2015NewLine                count = rr.Read(read, 0, bufferSize);Di2015NewLine              }Di2015NewLine              return sb.ToString();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine          }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return null;Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

4875169Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass Program {Di2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args) {Di2015NewLine        string full = "Bacliff New Texas United States";Di2015NewLine        // split the string in wordsDi2015NewLine        string[] words = full.Split(new char[] { ' ' }, StringSplitOptions.RemoveEmptyEntries);Di2015NewLine        // get substrings 'size' words longDi2015NewLine        for (int size = 1; size <= words.Length; ++size) {Di2015NewLine            string[] destination = new string[size];Di2015NewLine            for (int start = 0; start <= words.Length - size; ++start) {Di2015NewLine                Array.Copy(words, start, destination, 0, size);Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine(string.Join(" ", destination));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
4875169Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass Program {Di2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args) {Di2015NewLine        string full = "Bacliff New Texas United States";Di2015NewLine        // split the string in wordsDi2015NewLine        string[] words = full.Split(new char[] { ' ' }, StringSplitOptions.RemoveEmptyEntries);Di2015NewLine        for (int size = 1; size < words.Length; ++size) {Di2015NewLine            // get substrings of 'size' wordsDi2015NewLine            for (int start = 0; start <= words.Length - size; ++start) {Di2015NewLine                string[] before = new string[start];Di2015NewLine                string[] destination = new string[size];Di2015NewLine                string[] after = new string[words.Length - (size + start)];Di2015NewLine                Array.Copy(words, 0, before, 0, before.Length);Di2015NewLine                Array.Copy(words, start, destination, 0, destination.Length);Di2015NewLine                Array.Copy(words, start + destination.Length, after, 0, after.Length);Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("{0} % {1} % {2}",Di2015NewLine                    string.Join(" ", before),Di2015NewLine                    string.Join(" ", destination),Di2015NewLine                    string.Join(" ", after));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

4877120Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static byte[] ReadFile(string filePath)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  byte[] buffer;Di2015NewLine  FileStream fileStream = new FileStream(filePath, FileMode.Open, FileAccess.Read);Di2015NewLine  tryDi2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine     int length = (int)fileStream.Length;  // get file lengthDi2015NewLine     buffer = new byte[length];            // create bufferDi2015NewLine     int count;                            // actual number of bytes readDi2015NewLine     int sum = 0;                          // total number of bytes readDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // read until Read method returns 0 (end of the stream has been reached)Di2015NewLine    while ((count = fileStream.Read(buffer, sum, length - sum)) > 0)Di2015NewLine       sum += count;  // sum is a buffer offset for next readingDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  finallyDi2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    fileStream.Close();Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine   return buffer;Di2015NewLine }Di2015NewLine

4877891Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing HtmlAgilityPack;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static MvcHtmlString Repeater<T>(this HtmlHelper html, IEnumerable<T> items,Di2015NewLine    Func<T, HelperResult> itemTemplate,            Di2015NewLine    Func<string, HelperResult> containerTemplate,Di2015NewLine    Func<string, HelperResult> emptyTemplate)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (items == null)Di2015NewLine        return MvcHtmlString.Create(HttpContext.Current.Server.HtmlDecode(emptyTemplate("No Results").ToHtmlString()));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (items.Count() == 0)Di2015NewLine        return MvcHtmlString.Create(HttpContext.Current.Server.HtmlDecode(emptyTemplate("No Results").ToHtmlString()));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var enumerableProperties = typeof(T).GetProperties()Di2015NewLine                                        .Where( p => p is IEnumerable );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (var item in items)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var doc = new HtmlDocument();Di2015NewLine        doc.LoadHtml( itemTemplate(item).ToHtmlString() );Di2015NewLine        var root = doc.DocumentNode.FirstChild;Di2015NewLine        var insertNode = FindInsertNode( doc ); // this needs to be written        Di2015NewLine        foreach (var property in enumerableProperties)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine             var value = property.GetValue( item, null ) as IEnumerable;Di2015NewLine             var newNode = new HtmlNodeDi2015NewLine                           {Di2015NewLine                               InnerHtml = html.Repeater( value, itemTemplate, containerTemplate, emptyTemplate )Di2015NewLine                           };Di2015NewLine             root.InsertAfter( newNode, insertNode );Di2015NewLine             insertNode = newNode;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        sb.Append(html.InnerText);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return MvcHtmlString.Create(HttpContext.Current.Server.HtmlDecode(containerTemplate(sb.ToString()).ToHtmlString()));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

4878680Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic IEnumerable<char[]> AlphaCombinations(int length = 5, char startChar = 'A', char endChar = 'C')Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int numChars = endChar - startChar + 1;Di2015NewLine    var s = new String(startChar, length).ToCharArray();    Di2015NewLine    for (int it = 1; it <= Math.Pow(numChars, length); ++it) Di2015NewLine    {        Di2015NewLine        yield return s;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int ix = 0; ix < s.Length; ++ix) Di2015NewLine            if (ix == 0 || it % Math.Pow(numChars, ix) == 0) Di2015NewLine                s[s.Length - 1 - ix] = (char)(startChar + (s[s.Length - 1 - ix] - startChar + 1) % numChars);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine...Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineforeach (var s in AlphaCombinations(5))Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine(s);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

4879539Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<string> SmartSplit(this string input, int maxLength)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int i = 0;Di2015NewLine    while(i + maxLength < input.Length)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int index = input.LastIndexOf(' ', i + maxLength);Di2015NewLine        yield return input.Substring(i, index - i);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        i = index + 1;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    yield return input.Substring(i);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

4880783Di2015UniqueSeparatorFunc<string, string>
4880783Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate string RenderType(string render, Func<string, string> lookupFunc, string prefix, string regexWild, string suffix)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string regex = prefix + regexWild + suffix;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    MatchCollection matches = Regex.Matches(render, regex);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (Match match in matches)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        foreach (Capture capture in match.Captures)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string name = capture.Value.Replace(prefix, "", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase).Replace(suffix, "", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //-- point of differenceDi2015NewLine            string value = lookupFunc(name);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            render = render.Replace(capture.Value, value);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return render;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

4881503Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<IGrouping<int, T>> Di2015NewLine    GroupConsecutive<T>(this IEnumerable<T> set, Func<T, T, bool> predicate)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var i = 0;Di2015NewLine    var k = 0;Di2015NewLine    var ranges = from e in setDi2015NewLine                 let idx = ++iDi2015NewLine                 let next = set.ElementAtOrDefault(idx)Di2015NewLine                 let key = (predicate(e, next)) ? k : k++Di2015NewLine                 group e by key into gDi2015NewLine                 select g;Di2015NewLine    return ranges;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
4881503Di2015UniqueSeparatorvoid Main()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    LinkedList<string> myList = new LinkedList<string>();Di2015NewLine    myList.AddLast("aaa");Di2015NewLine    myList.AddLast("aaa");Di2015NewLine    myList.AddLast("bbb");Di2015NewLine    myList.AddLast("bbb");Di2015NewLine    myList.AddLast("aaa");Di2015NewLine    myList.AddLast("aaa");Di2015NewLine    myList.AddLast("aaa");Di2015NewLine    IGrouping<int,string> ggg;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var groups=myList.GroupConsecutive((a,b)=>a==b);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    ILookup<string,int> lookup=groups.ToLookup(g=>g.First(),g=>g.Count());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach(var x in lookup["aaa"])Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(x); //outputs 2 then 3Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    foreach(var x in lookup["bbb"])Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(x); //outputs 2Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

4884343Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IObservable<U> Fork<T, U>(this IObservable<T> source,Di2015NewLine    Func<T, U> selector)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return source.Fork<T, U>(selector, Scheduler.TaskPool);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static IObservable<U> Fork<T, U>(this IObservable<T> source,Di2015NewLine    Func<T, U> selector, IScheduler scheduler)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return Observable.CreateWithDisposable<U>(observer =>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var runningTasks = new CompositeDisposable();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var lockGate = new object();Di2015NewLine        var queue = new Queue<ForkTask<U>>();Di2015NewLine        var completing = false;Di2015NewLine        var subscription = new MutableDisposable();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Action<Exception> onError = ex =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            lock(lockGate)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                queue.Clear();Di2015NewLine                observer.OnError(ex);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Action dequeue = () =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            lock (lockGate)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var error = false;Di2015NewLine                while (queue.Count > 0 && queue.Peek().Completed)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    var task = queue.Dequeue();Di2015NewLine                    observer.OnNext(task.Value);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                if (completing && queue.Count == 0)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    observer.OnCompleted();Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Action onCompleted = () =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            lock (lockGate)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                completing = true;Di2015NewLine                dequeue();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Action<T> enqueue = t =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var cancellation = new MutableDisposable();Di2015NewLine            var task = new ForkTask<U>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            lock(lockGate)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                runningTasks.Add(cancellation);Di2015NewLine                queue.Enqueue(task);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            cancellation.Disposable = scheduler.Schedule(() =>Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                tryDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    task.Value = selector(t);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    lock(lockGate)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        task.Completed = true;Di2015NewLine                        runningTasks.Remove(cancellation);Di2015NewLine                        dequeue();Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                catch(Exception ex)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    onError(ex);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            });Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return new CompositeDisposable(runningTasks, Di2015NewLine            source.AsObservable().Subscribe(Di2015NewLine                t => { enqueue(t); },Di2015NewLine                x => { onError(x); },Di2015NewLine                () => { onCompleted(); }Di2015NewLine            ));Di2015NewLine    });Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate class ForkTask<T>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public T Value = default(T);Di2015NewLine    public bool Completed = false;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

4885552Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class GmailClient : IDisposableDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private const string GmailUri = "https://mail.google.com/mail/feed/atom";Di2015NewLine    private string _userName;Di2015NewLine    private string _password;Di2015NewLine    private GmailList _newMailList;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public GmailClient(string userName, string password)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _userName = userName;Di2015NewLine        _password = password;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// I'd prefer to return the generic list here instead of using the GetMailItem Di2015NewLine    /// method to get individual items, but javascript doesn't play nice with generics.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public void GetUnreadMail()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        try Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Get the XML feed from mail.google.comDi2015NewLine            XmlElement element = GetFeedXml();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (element != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Deserialize the transformed XML into a generic list of GmailItem objectsDi2015NewLine                XmlNodeReader reader = new XmlNodeReader(element);Di2015NewLine                XmlSerializer serializer = new XmlSerializer(typeof(GmailList));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                _newMailList = serializer.Deserialize(reader) as GmailList;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch { }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// The number of items in the unread mail collectionDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public object UnreadMailCountDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (_newMailList != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return _newMailList.Count;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return 0;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Returns the GmailItem at the specified indexDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="index">Index if the mail item to return</param>Di2015NewLine    public GmailItem GetMailItem(int index)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (_newMailList == null || index < 0 || index > _newMailList.Count)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new IndexOutOfRangeException();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return _newMailList[index];Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Get the XML feed from google and transform it into a deserializable formatDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    private XmlElement GetFeedXml()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Create a web request to get the xml feedDi2015NewLine            HttpWebRequest request = (HttpWebRequest)WebRequest.Create(GmailUri);Di2015NewLine            request.Method = "GET";Di2015NewLine            request.Credentials = new NetworkCredential(_userName, _password);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            XmlDocument xml = null;Di2015NewLine            HttpWebResponse response = (HttpWebResponse)request.GetResponse();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // If the request/response is successfulDi2015NewLine            if (response.StatusCode == HttpStatusCode.OK)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Get the response stream containing the xmlDi2015NewLine                using (XmlTextReader reader = new XmlTextReader(response.GetResponseStream()))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // Load the XSLT document (it's an embedded resource)Di2015NewLine                    byte[] data = Encoding.ASCII.GetBytes(GmailReader.Properties.Resources.GmailTransform);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    using (MemoryStream xsltStream = new MemoryStream(data))Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        // Create a text reader with the XSLT documentDi2015NewLine                        XmlTextReader stylesheetReader = new XmlTextReader(xsltStream);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        XslCompiledTransform transform = new XslCompiledTransform();Di2015NewLine                        transform.Load(stylesheetReader);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        // Run an XSLT transform on the google feed to get an xml structure Di2015NewLine                        // that can be deserialized into a GmailList objectDi2015NewLine                        using (MemoryStream ms = new MemoryStream())Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            transform.Transform(new XPathDocument(reader), null, ms);Di2015NewLine                            ms.Seek(0, SeekOrigin.Begin);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                            xml = new XmlDocument();Di2015NewLine                            // Load the transformed xmlDi2015NewLine                            xml.Load(ms);Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            response.Close();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return xml.DocumentElement;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catchDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return null;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #region IDisposable MembersDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Dispose()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Nothing to do here.Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #endregionDi2015NewLine}}Di2015NewLine

4885952Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class RandomReadableStringSource : DatasourceBase<string>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly char[] _Vocals = new char[] { 'a', 'e', 'i', 'o', 'u' };Di2015NewLine    private readonly char[] _Consonants = new char[] { 'b', 'c', 'd', 'f', 'g', 'h', 'k', 'l', 'm', 'n', 'p', 'r', 's', 't', 'v', 'w' };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private Random _Random;Di2015NewLine    private int _Minimum;Di2015NewLine    private int _Maximum;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public RandomReadableStringSource()Di2015NewLine        : this(20)Di2015NewLine    { }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public RandomReadableStringSource(int max)Di2015NewLine        : this(5, max)Di2015NewLine    { }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public RandomReadableStringSource(int min, int max)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (min <= 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("minimum must be greater zero.");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (min > max)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("minimum must be less or equal maximum.");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        _Random = new Random();Di2015NewLine        _Minimum = min;Di2015NewLine        _Maximum = max;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override string Next(IGenerationSession session)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var length = _Random.Next(_Minimum, _Maximum);Di2015NewLine        var sb = new StringBuilder(length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < length; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var array = i % 2 == 0 ? _Consonants : _Vocals;Di2015NewLine            sb.Append(array[_Random.Next(array.Length)]);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return sb.ToString();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class DateTimeUniqueSource : DatasourceBase<DateTime>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private Random _Random;Di2015NewLine    private DateTime _LastDateTime;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public DateTimeUniqueSource()Di2015NewLine        : this(new DateTime(1900, 1, 1))Di2015NewLine    { }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public DateTimeUniqueSource(DateTime startdate)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (startdate == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentNullException("startdate");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        _Random = new Random();Di2015NewLine        _LastDateTime = startdate;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override DateTime Next(IGenerationSession session)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _LastDateTime = _LastDateTime.AddHours(_Random.NextDouble() * 1000);Di2015NewLine        return _LastDateTime;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

4886780Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic readonly Assembly[] References = new[] { typeof(Enumerable).Assembly, typeof(Component).Assembly };Di2015NewLinepublic Action CompileMethodstring source) {Di2015NewLine    var options = new CompilerParameters(References.Select(a => a.Location).ToArray()) {Di2015NewLine        GenerateInMemory = trueDi2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLine    string fullSource = @"public static class HolderClass { public static void Execute() { \\r\\n" + source + "\\r\\n} }";Di2015NewLine    try {Di2015NewLine        var compiler = new CSharpCodeProvider(new Dictionary<string, string> { { "CompilerVersion", "v4.0" } });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var results = compiler.CompileAssemblyFromSource(options, fullSource);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (results.Errors.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine            throw new InvalidOperationException(String.Join(Di2015NewLine                Environment.NewLine, Di2015NewLine                results.Errors.Cast<CompilerError>().Select(ce => ce.ErrorText)Di2015NewLine            ));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return (Action)Delegate.CreateDelegate(Di2015NewLine            typeof(Action),Di2015NewLine            results.CompiledAssembly.GetType("HolderClass").GetMethod("Execute")Di2015NewLine        );Di2015NewLine    } finally { options.TempFiles.Delete(); }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

4887041Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar lst1 = new [] { 2,2,2,2 };Di2015NewLinevar lst2 = new [] { 2,3,4,5 };Di2015NewLinevar lst3 = new [] { 5,4,3,2 };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//your current function which will return trueDi2015NewLine//when you compare lst1 and lst2, even thoughDi2015NewLine//lst1 is just a subset of lst2 and is not actually equalDi2015NewLine//as mentioned by Wim CoenenDi2015NewLine(lst1.Count() == lst2.Count() &&Di2015NewLine        !lst1.Except(lst2).Any()); //incorrectly returns trueDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//this also only checks to see if one list is a subset of anotherDi2015NewLine//also mentioned by Wim CoenenDi2015NewLinelst1.Intersect(lst2).Any(); //incorrectly returns trueDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//So even if order doesn't matter, you can make it matter just forDi2015NewLine//the equality check like so:Di2015NewLinelst1.OrderBy(x => x).SequenceEqual(lst2.OrderBy(x => x)); //correctly returns falseDi2015NewLinelst3.OrderBy(x => x).SequenceEqual(lst2.OrderBy(x => x)); // correctly returns trueDi2015NewLine

4889227Di2015UniqueSeparator//Stop flashing. The system restores the window to its original state. Di2015NewLinepublic const UInt32 FLASHW_STOP = 0; Di2015NewLine//Flash the window caption. Di2015NewLinepublic const UInt32 FLASHW_CAPTION = 1; Di2015NewLine//Flash the taskbar button. Di2015NewLinepublic const UInt32 FLASHW_TRAY = 2; Di2015NewLine//Flash both the window caption and taskbar button.Di2015NewLine//This is equivalent to setting the FLASHW_CAPTION | FLASHW_TRAY flags. Di2015NewLinepublic const UInt32 FLASHW_ALL = 3; Di2015NewLine//Flash continuously, until the FLASHW_STOP flag is set. Di2015NewLinepublic const UInt32 FLASHW_TIMER = 4; Di2015NewLine//Flash continuously until the window comes to the foreground. Di2015NewLinepublic const UInt32 FLASHW_TIMERNOFG = 12;Di2015NewLine
4889227Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Flashes a windowDi2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="hWnd">The handle to the window to flash</param>Di2015NewLine/// <returns>whether or not the window needed flashing</returns>Di2015NewLinepublic static bool FlashWindowEx(IntPtr hWnd)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    FLASHWINFO fInfo = new FLASHWINFO();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    fInfo.cbSize = Convert.ToUInt32(Marshal.SizeOf(fInfo));Di2015NewLine    fInfo.hwnd = hWnd;Di2015NewLine    fInfo.dwFlags = FLASHW_ALL;Di2015NewLine    fInfo.uCount = UInt32.MaxValue;Di2015NewLine    fInfo.dwTimeout = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return FlashWindowEx(ref fInfo);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
4889227Di2015UniqueSeparator/// Minor adjust to the code aboveDi2015NewLine/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Flashes a window until the window comes to the foregroundDi2015NewLine/// Receives the form that will flashDi2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="hWnd">The handle to the window to flash</param>Di2015NewLine/// <returns>whether or not the window needed flashing</returns>Di2015NewLinepublic static bool FlashWindowEx(Form frm)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine        IntPtr hWnd = frm.Handle;Di2015NewLine        FLASHWINFO fInfo = new FLASHWINFO();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        fInfo.cbSize = Convert.ToUInt32(Marshal.SizeOf(fInfo));Di2015NewLine        fInfo.hwnd = hWnd;Di2015NewLine        fInfo.dwFlags = FLASHW_ALL | FLASHW_TIMERNOFG;Di2015NewLine        fInfo.uCount = UInt32.MaxValue;Di2015NewLine        fInfo.dwTimeout = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return FlashWindowEx(ref fInfo);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

4892571Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Utility methods for enum values. This static type will fail to initialize Di2015NewLine/// (throwing a <see cref="TypeInitializationException"/>) ifDi2015NewLine/// you try to provide a value that is not an enum.Di2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLine/// <typeparam name="T">An enum type. </typeparam>Di2015NewLinepublic static class EnumUtil<T>Di2015NewLine    where T : struct, IConvertible // Try to get as much of a static check as we can.Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // The .NET framework doesn't provide a compile-checkedDi2015NewLine    // way to ensure that a type is an enum, so we have to check when the typeDi2015NewLine    // is statically invoked.Di2015NewLine    static EnumUtil()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Throw Exception on static initialization if the given type isn't an enum.Di2015NewLine        Require.That(typeof (T).IsEnum, () => typeof(T).FullName + " is not an enum type.");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// In the .NET Framework, objects can be cast to enum values which are notDi2015NewLine    /// defined for their type. This method provides a simple fail-fast checkDi2015NewLine    /// that the enum value is defined, and creates a cast at the same time.Di2015NewLine    /// Cast the given value as the given enum type.Di2015NewLine    /// Throw an exception if the value is not defined for the given enum type.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <typeparam name="T"></typeparam>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="enumValue"></param>Di2015NewLine    /// <exception cref="InvalidCastException">Di2015NewLine    /// If the given value is not a defined value of the enum type.Di2015NewLine    /// </exception>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLine    public static T DefinedCast(object enumValue)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!System.Enum.IsDefined(typeof(T), enumValue))Di2015NewLine            throw new InvalidCastException(enumValue + " is not a defined value for enum type " +Di2015NewLine                                           typeof (T).FullName);Di2015NewLine        return (T) enumValue;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="enumValue"></param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLine    public static T Parse(string enumValue)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var parsedValue = (T)System.Enum.Parse(typeof (T), enumValue);Di2015NewLine        //Require that the parsed value is definedDi2015NewLine        Require.That(parsedValue.IsDefined(), Di2015NewLine            () => new ArgumentException(string.Format("{0} is not a defined value for enum type {1}", Di2015NewLine                enumValue, typeof(T).FullName)));Di2015NewLine        return parsedValue;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static bool IsDefined(T enumValue)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return System.Enum.IsDefined(typeof (T), enumValue);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

4897654Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static void SetValue(string dictionaryName, string key, string value)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  if (!String.IsNullOrEmpty(key))Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (HttpContext.Current.Session[dictionaryName] != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Dictionary<string, string> form = (Dictionary<string, string>)HttpContext.Current.Session[dictionaryName];Di2015NewLine            if (form.ContainsKey(key))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                form[key] = value;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Logger.Error("{0}: Error while checking Session value from Dictionary", ex, "SessionDictionary");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

4898098Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static Boolean isValid(String xiString, String xiSig)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  AsnKeyParser keyParser = new AsnKeyParser("path/to/key.public");Di2015NewLine  DSAParameters publicKey = keyParser.ParseDSAPublicKey();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  DSACryptoServiceProvider DSA = new DSACryptoServiceProvider();Di2015NewLine  DSA.ImportParameters(publicKey);Di2015NewLine  DSASignatureDeformatter DSADeformatter = new DSASignatureDeformatter(DSA);Di2015NewLine  UTF8Encoding UTF8 = new UTF8Encoding();Di2015NewLine  byte[] plainBytes = UTF8.GetBytes(xiString);      Di2015NewLine  var sha1 = new SHA1Managed();Di2015NewLine  var hash = sha1.ComputeHash(plainBytes);Di2015NewLine  byte[] asn1SigBytes = Convert.FromBase64String(xiSig);Di2015NewLine  byte[] sigBytes = ConvertToP1363Signature(asn1SigBytes);Di2015NewLine  Boolean retVal = DSADeformatter.VerifySignature(hash, sigBytes);Di2015NewLine  return retVal;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
4898098Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static byte[] ConvertToP1363Signature(byte[] ASN1Sig)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  AsnParser asn = new AsnParser(ASN1Sig);Di2015NewLine  asn.NextSequence();Di2015NewLine  byte[] r = asn.NextInteger();Di2015NewLine  byte[] s = asn.NextInteger();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  // Returned to callerDi2015NewLine  byte[] p1363Signature = new byte[40];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  if (r.Length > 21 || (r.Length == 21 && r[0] != 0))Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    // WTF???Di2015NewLine    // Reject - signature verification failedDi2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  else if (r.Length == 21)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    // r[0] = 0Di2015NewLine    // r[1]'s high bit *should* be setDi2015NewLine    Array.Copy(r, 1, p1363Signature, 0, 20);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  else if (r.Length == 20)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    // r[0]'s high bit *should not* be setDi2015NewLine    Array.Copy(r, 0, p1363Signature, 0, 20);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  elseDi2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    // fewer than 20 bytesDi2015NewLine    int len = r.Length;Di2015NewLine    int off = 20 - len;Di2015NewLine    Array.Copy(r, 0, p1363Signature, off, len);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  if (s.Length > 21 || (s.Length == 21 && s[0] != 0))Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    // WTF???Di2015NewLine    // Reject - signature verification failedDi2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  else if (s.Length == 21)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    // s[0] = 0Di2015NewLine    // s[1]'s high bit *should* be setDi2015NewLine    Array.Copy(s, 1, p1363Signature, 20, 20);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  else if (s.Length == 20)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    // s[0]'s high bit *should not* be setDi2015NewLine    Array.Copy(s, 0, p1363Signature, 20, 20);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  elseDi2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    // fewer than 20 bytesDi2015NewLine    int len = s.Length;Di2015NewLine    int off = 40 - len;Di2015NewLine    Array.Copy(s, 0, p1363Signature, off, len);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  return p1363Signature;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

4900871Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.IO;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace ConsoleApplication1Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    class ProgramDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var di = new DirectoryInfo("C:\\\\SomeFolder");Di2015NewLine            di.CopyTo("E:\\\\SomeFolder", true);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static class DirectoryInfoExtensionsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Copies all files from one directory to another.Di2015NewLine    public static void CopyTo(this DirectoryInfo source, string destDirectory, bool recursive)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (source == null)Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentNullException("source");Di2015NewLine        if (destDirectory == null)Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentNullException("destDirectory");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // If the source doesn't exist, we have to throw an exception.Di2015NewLine        if (!source.Exists)Di2015NewLine            throw new DirectoryNotFoundException("Source directory not found: " + source.FullName);Di2015NewLine        // Compile the target.Di2015NewLine        DirectoryInfo target = new DirectoryInfo(destDirectory);Di2015NewLine        // If the target doesn't exist, we create it.Di2015NewLine        if (!target.Exists)Di2015NewLine            target.Create();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Get all files and copy them over.Di2015NewLine        foreach (FileInfo file in source.GetFiles())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            file.CopyTo(Path.Combine(target.FullName, file.Name), true);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Return if no recursive call is required.Di2015NewLine        if (!recursive)Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Do the same for all sub directories.Di2015NewLine        foreach (DirectoryInfo directory in source.GetDirectories())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            CopyTo(directory, Path.Combine(target.FullName, directory.Name), recursive);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

4901850Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic

4901876Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static string ConvertAge(DateTime dob)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        DateTime today = DateTime.Today;Di2015NewLine        string fmt = "{0:0##}{1}";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Greater than 2 Years old - Ouput YearsDi2015NewLine        if (dob <= today.AddYears(-2)) Di2015NewLine            return string.Format(fmt, (dob.DayOfYear <= today.DayOfYear) ? Di2015NewLine            (today.Year - dob.Year) : (today.Year - dob.Year)-1, "Y");Di2015NewLine        //Less than 2 Years - Output MonthsDi2015NewLine        if (dob < today.AddMonths(-2)) Di2015NewLine            return string.Format(fmt, (dob.DayOfYear <= today.DayOfYear) ? Di2015NewLine            (today.Year - dob.Year) * 12 + (today.Month - dob.Month) : Di2015NewLine            ((today.Year - dob.Year) * 12 + (today.Month - dob.Month))-1 , "M");Di2015NewLine        //Less than 2 Months - Output WeeksDi2015NewLine        if (dob < today.AddDays(-2 * 7)) Di2015NewLine            return string.Format(fmt, (today - dob).Days / 7, "W");Di2015NewLine        //Less than 2 Weeks - Output DaysDi2015NewLine        return string.Format(fmt, (today - dob).Days, "D");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
4901876Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic string ConvertAge(DateTime dateOfBirth)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int daysOld = (DateTime.Now - dateOfBirth).Days;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //Age < 6 WeeksDi2015NewLine            if (daysOld < (6 * 7)) Di2015NewLine                return String.Format("{0:0##}{1}", daysOld, 'D'); Di2015NewLine            //Age < 6 MonthsDi2015NewLine            else if (daysOld < (6 * 31)) Di2015NewLine                return String.Format("{0:0##}{1}", daysOld/7, 'W');Di2015NewLine            //Age < 2 YearsDi2015NewLine            else if (daysOld < (2 * 365)) Di2015NewLine                return String.Format("{0:0##}{1}", daysOld / 31, 'M');Di2015NewLine            //Age >= 2 YearsDi2015NewLine            else Di2015NewLine                return String.Format("{0:0##}{1}", daysOld / 365, 'Y');Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine
4901877Di2015UniqueSeparatorBlockingCollection
4901877Di2015UniqueSeparator// Shared queue.  Assuming that a tag is simply a string.Di2015NewLineBlockingCollection<string> TagQueue = new BlockingCollection<string>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Tag reader threads (producers)Di2015NewLinewhile (!ShutdownMessageReceived)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string tag = GetTagFromReader(); // however that's doneDi2015NewLine    TagQueue.Add(tag);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Processing thread (consumer)Di2015NewLinewhile (!ShutdownMessageReceived)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string tag = TagQueue.Take();Di2015NewLine    // process the tagDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
4901877Di2015UniqueSeparatorBlockingCollection
4901877Di2015UniqueSeparatorTake
4901877Di2015UniqueSeparatorBlockingCollection

locationDi2015NewLine// of the image as per your machine settingsDi2015NewLineString SourceLoc  = "D:/Images/photo.jpg";Di2015NewLineString DestinationLoc = "D:/Images/TestImage.jpg";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// provide read access to the fileDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineFileStream fs = new FileStream(SourceLoc, FileMode.Open,FileAccess.Read);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Create a byte array of file stream lengthDi2015NewLinebyte[] ImageData = new byte[fs.Length];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//Read block of bytes from stream into the byte arrayDi2015NewLinefs.Read(ImageData,0,System.Convert.ToInt32(fs.Length));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//Close the File StreamDi2015NewLinefs.Close();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Step 3Di2015NewLine// Create Anonymous PL/SQL block stringDi2015NewLineString block = " BEGIN " +Di2015NewLine               " INSERT INTO testblob (id, photo) VALUES (100, :1); " +Di2015NewLine               " SELECT photo into :2 from testblob WHERE id = 100; " +Di2015NewLine               " END; ";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Set command to create Anonymous PL/SQL BlockDi2015NewLineOracleCommand command typeDi2015NewLine// as Text instead of StoredProcedureDi2015NewLinecmd.CommandType = CommandType.Text;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Step 4Di2015NewLine// Setting Oracle parametersDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Bind the parameter as OracleDbType.Blob to command for inserting imageDi2015NewLineOracleParameter param = cmd.Parameters.Add("blobtodb", OracleDbType.Blob);Di2015NewLineparam.Direction = ParameterDirection.Input;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Assign Byte Array to Oracle ParameterDi2015NewLineparam.Value = ImageData;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Bind the parameter as OracleDbType.Blob to command for retrieving the imageDi2015NewLineOracleParameter param2 = cmd.Parameters.Add("blobfromdb", OracleDbType.Blob);Di2015NewLineparam2.Direction = ParameterDirection.Output;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Step 5Di2015NewLine// Execute the Anonymous PL/SQL BlockDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// The anonymous PL/SQL block inserts the image to theDi2015NewLine// database and then retrieves the images as an output parameterDi2015NewLinecmd.ExecuteNonQuery();Di2015NewLineConsole.WriteLine("Image file inserted to database from " + SourceLoc);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Step 6Di2015NewLine// Save the retrieved image to the DestinationLoc in the file systemDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Create a (byte[])((OracleBlob)(cmd.Parameters[1].Value)).Value;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// get the length of the byte arrayDi2015NewLineint ArraySize = new int();Di2015NewLineArraySize = byteData.GetUpperBound(0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Write the Blob data fetched from database to the filesystem at theDi2015NewLine// destination locationDi2015NewLineFileStream fs1 = new FileStream(@DestinationLoc,Di2015NewLine                                FileMode.OpenOrCreate, FileAccess.Write);Di2015NewLinefs1.Write(byteData, 0,ArraySize);Di2015NewLinefs1.Close();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineConsole.WriteLine("Image saved to " + DestinationLoc + " successfully 4906847Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass WordCount {Di2015NewLine    const string Symbols = ",;.:-()\\t!?\\"[]{}&<>+-*/=#'";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static string normalize(string str)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var toret = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for(int i = 0; i < str.Length; ++i) {Di2015NewLine            if ( Symbols.IndexOf( str[ i ] ) > -1 ) {Di2015NewLine                toret.Append( ' ' );Di2015NewLine            } else {Di2015NewLine                toret.Append( char.ToLower( str[ i ] ) );Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return toret.ToString();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private string word;Di2015NewLine    public string Word {Di2015NewLine        get { return this.word; }Di2015NewLine        set { this.word = value; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private string str;Di2015NewLine    public string Str {Di2015NewLine        get { return this.str; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private string[] words = null;Di2015NewLine    public string[] Words {Di2015NewLine       if ( this.words == null ) {Di2015NewLine           this.words = this.Str.split( ' ' );Di2015NewLine       }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine       return this.words;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public WordCount(string str, string w)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine         this.str = ' ' + normalize( str ) + ' ';Di2015NewLine         this.word = w;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public int Times()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return this.Times( this.Word );Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public int Times(string word)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int times = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        word = ' ' + word + ' ';Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int wordLength = word.Length;Di2015NewLine        int pos = this.Str.IndexOf( word );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        while( pos > -1 ) {Di2015NewLine            ++times;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            pos = this.Str.IndexOf( pos + wordLength, word );Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return times;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public double Percentage()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return this.Percentage( this.Word );Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public double Percentage(string word)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return ( this.Times( word ) / this.Words.Length );Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

4908920Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic partial class Form1 : FormDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    const float maxWorkedValue = 100;Di2015NewLine    const int threadCount = 5;Di2015NewLine    float maxWorkedValue2 = 1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Thread thread;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Form1()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        InitializeComponent();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        prBar.Maximum = (int)maxWorkedValue;Di2015NewLine        prBar.Step = 1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        thread = new Thread(BeginCalculate) { Name = "Father thread" };Di2015NewLine        thread.Start();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    void BeginCalculate()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Parallel.For(0, (int)maxWorkedValue,Di2015NewLine            (i) =>Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                float currentProgress = CalculateLongTask(i);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // here we are (probably) in a thread child Di2015NewLine                //of "Father thread" so let's use ManagedThreadId instead of the name...Di2015NewLine                Update((currentProgress / maxWorkedValue) * 100, Thread.CurrentThread.ManagedThreadId.ToString());Di2015NewLine                Thread.Sleep(2);Di2015NewLine                return;Di2015NewLine            });Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    float CalculateLongTask(int value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < value; i++)Di2015NewLine            Thread.Sleep(15);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return maxWorkedValue2++;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    void Update(float i, string threadName)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (InvokeRequired)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            BeginInvoke(new Action<float, string>(Update), new object[] { i, threadName });Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        label1.Text = threadName;Di2015NewLine        prBar.Value = Math.Min((int)i, 100);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

4909310Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic byte[] DoubleToReal48(double d)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    byte[] r = new byte[6];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    long bits = BitConverter.DoubleToInt64Bits(d);Di2015NewLine    bool negative = ((bits >> 63) & 1) != 0;Di2015NewLine    long exponent = ((bits >> 52) & 0x7FF) - 1023;Di2015NewLine    long mantissa = bits & 0xFFFFFFFFFFFFFL;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    long raw = (negative ? 1 : 0);Di2015NewLine    raw = (raw << 39) | (mantissa >> 13);Di2015NewLine    raw = (raw << 8) | ((exponent + 129) & 0xFF);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (int k = 0; k < 6; k++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        r[k] = (byte)(raw & 0xFF);Di2015NewLine        raw >>= 8;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return r;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic double Real48ToDouble(byte[] r)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    long raw = 0;Di2015NewLine    for (int k = 5; k >= 0; k--)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        raw = (raw << 8) | r[k];Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    long mantissa = (raw << 5) & 0xFFFFFFFFFD000L;Di2015NewLine    long exponent = (((raw & 0xFF) - 129 + 1023) & 0x7FF) << 52;Di2015NewLine    long sign = (((raw & ~0x7FFFFFFFFFFFL) != 0) ? 1 : 0) << 63;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return BitConverter.Int64BitsToDouble(sign | exponent | mantissa);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
4909445Di2015UniqueSeparator    protected void Page_Load(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string input = @"My link: [url='http://www.something.com'][b]Some text[/b][/url] is awesome. Jazz hands activate!!";Di2015NewLine        string result = Parse(input);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//Result: My link: <a href="http://www.something.com"><b>Some text</b></a> is awesome. Jazz hands activate!!Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static string Parse(string input)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string regex = @"\\[([^=]+)[=\\x22']*(\\S*?)['\\x22]*\\](.+?)\\[/(\\1)\\]";Di2015NewLine        MatchCollection matches = new Regex(regex).Matches(input);Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < matches.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var tag = matches[i].Groups[1].Value;Di2015NewLine            var optionalValue = matches[i].Groups[2].Value;Di2015NewLine            var content = matches[i].Groups[3].Value;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (Regex.IsMatch(content, regex)) Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                content = Parse(content);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            content = HandleTags(content, optionalValue, tag);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            input = input.Replace(matches[i].Groups[0].Value, content);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return input;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static string HandleTags(string content, string optionalValue, string tag)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        switch (tag.ToLower())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            case "url":Di2015NewLine                return string.Format("<a href=\\"{0}\\">{1}</a>", optionalValue, content);Di2015NewLine            case "b":Di2015NewLine                return string.Format("<b>{0}</b>", content);Di2015NewLine            default:Di2015NewLine                return string.Empty;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

4922912Di2015UniqueSeparator public class PdfMergeDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public static void MergeFiles(string destinationFile, List<string> sourceFiles)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int f = 0;Di2015NewLine            // we create a reader for a certain documentDi2015NewLine            PdfReader reader = new PdfReader(sourceFiles[f]);Di2015NewLine            // we retrieve the total number of pagesDi2015NewLine            int n = reader.NumberOfPages;Di2015NewLine            // step 1: creation of a document-objectDi2015NewLine            Document document = new Document(reader.GetPageSizeWithRotation(1));Di2015NewLine            // step 2: we create a writer that listens to the documentDi2015NewLine            PdfWriter writer = PdfWriter.GetInstance(document, new FileStream(destinationFile, FileMode.Create));Di2015NewLine            // step 3: we open the documentDi2015NewLine            document.Open();Di2015NewLine            PdfContentByte cb = writer.DirectContent;Di2015NewLine            PdfImportedPage page;Di2015NewLine            int rotation;Di2015NewLine            // step 4: we add contentDi2015NewLine            while (f < sourceFiles.Count)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                int i = 0;Di2015NewLine                while (i < n)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    i++;Di2015NewLine                    document.SetPageSize(reader.GetPageSizeWithRotation(i));Di2015NewLine                    document.NewPage();Di2015NewLine                    page = writer.GetImportedPage(reader, i);Di2015NewLine                    rotation = reader.GetPageRotation(i);Di2015NewLine                    if (rotation == 90 || rotation == 270)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        cb.AddTemplate(page, 0, -1f, 1f, 0, 0, reader.GetPageSizeWithRotation(i).Height);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    elseDi2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        cb.AddTemplate(page, 1f, 0, 0, 1f, 0, 0);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                f++;Di2015NewLine                if (f < sourceFiles.Count)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    reader = new PdfReader(sourceFiles[f]);Di2015NewLine                    // we retrieve the total number of pagesDi2015NewLine                    n = reader.NumberOfPages;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            // step 5: we close the documentDi2015NewLine            document.Close();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

4923740Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text;Di2015NewLineusing System.IO;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text.RegularExpressions;Di2015NewLineusing System.Diagnostics;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace TFDestroyDeletedDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  class ProgramDi2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      if (args.Length < 1 || args.Length > 3)Di2015NewLine        Usage();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      bool prepareOnly = false;Di2015NewLine      bool previewOnly = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      if (args.Any(s => StringComparer.InvariantCultureIgnoreCaseDi2015NewLine          .Compare(s, "preview") == 0)) previewOnly = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      if (args.Any(s => StringComparer.InvariantCultureIgnoreCaseDi2015NewLine          .Compare(s, "norun") == 0)) prepareOnly = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      string tfOutput = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      Process p = new Process();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      p.StartInfo = new ProcessStartInfo("tf")Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        Arguments = string.FormatDi2015NewLine          ("dir /recursive /deleted \\"{0}\\"", args[0]),Di2015NewLine        UseShellExecute = false,Di2015NewLine        RedirectStandardOutput = true,Di2015NewLine        RedirectStandardError = true,Di2015NewLine        RedirectStandardInput = trueDi2015NewLine      };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      p.Start();Di2015NewLine      tfOutput = p.StandardOutput.ReadToEnd();Di2015NewLine      p.WaitForExit();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      string basePath = null;Di2015NewLine      string nextDelete = null;Di2015NewLine      List<string> toDelete = new List<string>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      using (var ms = Di2015NewLine        new MemoryStream(Encoding.Default.GetBytes(tfOutput)))Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        using (StreamReader sr = new StreamReader(ms))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine          while (!sr.EndOfStream)Di2015NewLine          {Di2015NewLine            nextDelete = null;Di2015NewLine            string line = sr.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine            if (string.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(line))Di2015NewLine              basePath = null;Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine              if (basePath == null)Di2015NewLine              {Di2015NewLine                if (line.EndsWith(":"))Di2015NewLine                  basePath = line.Substring(0, line.Length - 1);Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                  continue;Di2015NewLine              }Di2015NewLine              elseDi2015NewLine              {Di2015NewLine                nextDelete = Regex.Match(line, @"^.*?;X[0-9]+").Value;Di2015NewLine                if (!string.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(nextDelete))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                  toDelete.Add(Di2015NewLine                    string.FormatDi2015NewLine                    ( Di2015NewLine                      "{0}/{1}", basePath, Di2015NewLine                      nextDelete.StartsWith("$") ? nextDelete.Substring(1) Di2015NewLine                      : nextDeleteDi2015NewLine                    ));Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine              }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine          }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      using (var fs = File.OpenWrite("destroy.tfc"))Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        fs.SetLength(0);Di2015NewLine        using (var sw = new StreamWriter(fs))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine          //do the longest items first, naturally deleting items before theirDi2015NewLine          //parent foldersDi2015NewLine          foreach (var s in toDelete.OrderByDescending(s => s.Length))Di2015NewLine          {Di2015NewLine            if (!previewOnly)Di2015NewLine              sw.WriteLine("destroy \\"{0}\\" /i", s);Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine              sw.WriteLine("destroy \\"{0}\\" /i /preview", s);Di2015NewLine          }Di2015NewLine          sw.Flush();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      if (!prepareOnly)Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        p.StartInfo = new ProcessStartInfo("tf")Di2015NewLine          {Di2015NewLine            Arguments = string.Format("@{0}", "destroy.tfc"),Di2015NewLine            UseShellExecute = falseDi2015NewLine          };Di2015NewLine        p.Start();Di2015NewLine        p.WaitForExit();Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      p.Close();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void Usage()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      Console.WriteLine(@"Usage:Di2015NewLineTFDestroyDeleted [TFFolder] (preview) (norun)Di2015NewLineWhere [TFFolder] is the TFS root folder to be purged - it should be quoted if there are spaces.  E.g: ""$/folder/subfolder"".Di2015NewLinenorun - Specify this if you only want a command file prepared for tf.Di2015NewLinepreview - Specify this if you want each destroy to be only a preview (i.e. when run, it won't actually do the destroy) ");Di2015NewLine      Environment.Exit(0);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

4925249Di2015UniqueSeparatorinterface ITask {Di2015NewLine    PrioirtyType Prioirty { get; }Di2015NewLine    bool Complete { get; }Di2015NewLine    void PerformOneUnitOfWork();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
4925249Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass MyQueue<TJob> where TJob : ITask Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Queue<TJob> high, med, low;Di2015NewLine    bool GetNextJob(ref TJob work)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if(work.Priority == PriorityType.High && !work.Complete)Di2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLine        lock(this)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if(high.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Enqueue(work);//requeue to pick back up laterDi2015NewLine                work = high.Dequeue();Di2015NewLine                return true;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            if(work.Priority == PriorityType.Med && !work.Complete)Di2015NewLine                return true;Di2015NewLine            if(med.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Enqueue(work);//requeue to pick back up laterDi2015NewLine                work = med.Dequeue();Di2015NewLine                return true;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            if(!work.Complete)Di2015NewLine                return true;Di2015NewLine            if(low.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                work = low.Dequeue();Di2015NewLine                return true;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            work = null;Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    void Enqueue(TJob work)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if(work.Complete) return;Di2015NewLine        lock(this)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            else if(work.Priority == PriorityType.High) high.Enqueue(work);Di2015NewLine            else if(work.Priority == PriorityType.Med) med.Enqueue(work);Di2015NewLine            else low.Enqueue(work);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
4925249Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic void RunWork()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    ITask job;Di2015NewLine    while(!_shutdown.WaitOne(0))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if(queue.GetNextJob(ref job))Di2015NewLine            job.PerformOneUnitOfWork();Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            WaitHandle.WaitAny(new WaitHandle[] { _shutdown, queue.WorkReadyHandle });Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

4925840Di2015UniqueSeparator    private static string ConvertToHex(byte[] data)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string hex = "";Di2015NewLine        foreach (byte b in data)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            hex += b.ToString("X2");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return hex;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static byte[] HexString2ByteArray(string hexString)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        byte[] output = new byte[hexString.Length / 2];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i <= hexString.Length - 2; i += 2)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine             output[i/2] = Convert.ToByte(hexString.Substring(i, 2), 16);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return output;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
4925840Di2015UniqueSeparator    private static string _encrypt(string value, string key, string initVector)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        byte[] buffer = Encoding.Unicode.GetBytes(value);Di2015NewLine        byte[] encBuffer;Di2015NewLine        using (System.Security.Cryptography.RijndaelManaged rmt = new System.Security.Cryptography.RijndaelManaged())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            rmt.KeySize = 256;Di2015NewLine            rmt.BlockSize = 128;Di2015NewLine            rmt.Mode = System.Security.Cryptography.CipherMode.CBC;Di2015NewLine            rmt.Padding = System.Security.Cryptography.PaddingMode.ISO10126;Di2015NewLine            encBuffer = rmt.CreateEncryptor(Convert.FromBase64String(key),Di2015NewLine                Convert.FromBase64String(initVector)).TransformFinalBlock(buffer, 0, buffer.Length);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        string encryptValue = ConvertToHex(encBuffer);Di2015NewLine        return encryptValue;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static string _decrypt(string key, string initVector, string value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        byte[] hexBuffer = HexString2ByteArray(value);Di2015NewLine        byte[] decBuffer;Di2015NewLine        using (System.Security.Cryptography.RijndaelManaged rmt = new System.Security.Cryptography.RijndaelManaged())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            rmt.KeySize = 256;Di2015NewLine            rmt.BlockSize = 128;Di2015NewLine            rmt.Mode = System.Security.Cryptography.CipherMode.CBC;Di2015NewLine            rmt.Padding = System.Security.Cryptography.PaddingMode.ISO10126;Di2015NewLine            decBuffer = rmt.CreateDecryptor(Convert.FromBase64String(key),Di2015NewLine                Convert.FromBase64String(initVector)).TransformFinalBlock(hexBuffer, 0, hexBuffer.Length);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return Encoding.Unicode.GetString(decBuffer);Di2015NewLine    } Di2015NewLine
4925863Di2015UniqueSeparatorDecimal.TryParse

4926643Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IObservable<string> MergeJoin(Di2015NewLine    IObservable<int> left, IObservable<int> right, Func<int, int, string> selector)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return Observable.CreateWithDisposable<string>(o =>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Queue<int> a = new Queue<int>();Di2015NewLine        Queue<int> b = new Queue<int>();Di2015NewLine        object gate = new object();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        bool leftComplete = false;Di2015NewLine        bool rightComplete = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        MutableDisposable leftSubscription = new MutableDisposable();Di2015NewLine        MutableDisposable rightSubscription = new MutableDisposable();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Action tryDequeue = () =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            lock (gate)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                while (a.Count != 0 && b.Count != 0)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if (a.Peek() == b.Peek())Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        string value = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        tryDi2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            value = selector(a.Dequeue(), b.Dequeue());Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                        catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            o.OnError(ex);Di2015NewLine                            return;Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        o.OnNext(value);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    else if (a.Peek() < b.Peek())Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        a.Dequeue();Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    elseDi2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        b.Dequeue();Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        leftSubscription.Disposable = left.Subscribe(x =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            lock (gate)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (a.Count == 0 || a.Peek() < x)Di2015NewLine                    a.Enqueue(x);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                tryDequeue();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (rightComplete && b.Count == 0)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    o.OnCompleted();Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }, () =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            leftComplete = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (a.Count == 0 || rightComplete)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                o.OnCompleted();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        rightSubscription.Disposable = right.Subscribe(x =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            lock (gate)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (b.Count == 0 || b.Peek() < x)Di2015NewLine                    b.Enqueue(x);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                tryDequeue();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (rightComplete && b.Count == 0)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    o.OnCompleted();Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }, () =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            rightComplete = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (b.Count == 0 || leftComplete)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                o.OnCompleted();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return new CompositeDisposable(leftSubscription, rightSubscription);Di2015NewLine    });Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

4927766Di2015UniqueSeparatorCreateShellIDList
4927766Di2015UniqueSeparator[DllImport("shell32.dll", CharSet = CharSet.Auto)]Di2015NewLinepublic static extern IntPtr ILCreateFromPath(string path);Di2015NewLine[DllImport("shell32.dll", CharSet = CharSet.None)]Di2015NewLinepublic static extern void ILFree(IntPtr pidl);Di2015NewLine[DllImport("shell32.dll", CharSet = CharSet.None)]Di2015NewLinepublic static extern int ILGetSize(IntPtr pidl);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static MemoryStream CreateShellIDList(StringCollection filenames)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // first convert all files into pidls listDi2015NewLine    int pos = 0;Di2015NewLine    byte[][] pidls = new byte[filenames.Count][];Di2015NewLine    foreach (var filename in filenames)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Get pidl based on nameDi2015NewLine        IntPtr pidl = ILCreateFromPath(filename);Di2015NewLine        int pidlSize = ILGetSize(pidl);Di2015NewLine        // Copy over to our managed arrayDi2015NewLine        pidls[pos] = new byte[pidlSize];Di2015NewLine        Marshal.Copy(pidl, pidls[pos++], 0, pidlSize);Di2015NewLine        ILFree(pidl);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Determine where in CIDL we will start pumping PIDLsDi2015NewLine    int pidlOffset = 4 * (filenames.Count + 2);Di2015NewLine    // Start the CIDL streamDi2015NewLine    var memStream = new MemoryStream();Di2015NewLine    var sw = new BinaryWriter(memStream);Di2015NewLine    // Initialize CIDL witha count of filesDi2015NewLine    sw.Write(filenames.Count);Di2015NewLine    // Calcualte and write relative offsets of every pidl starting with rootDi2015NewLine    sw.Write(pidlOffset);Di2015NewLine    pidlOffset += 4; // root is 4 bytesDi2015NewLine    foreach(var pidl in pidls)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        sw.Write(pidlOffset);Di2015NewLine        pidlOffset += pidl.Length;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Write the root pidl (0) followed by all pidlsDi2015NewLine    sw.Write(0);Di2015NewLine    foreach(var pidl in pidls) sw.Write(pidl);Di2015NewLine    // stream now contains the CIDLDi2015NewLine    return memStream;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
