5010593Di2015UniqueSeparator// Variables.Di2015NewLineSystem.Net.HttpWebRequest Request;Di2015NewLineSystem.Net.WebResponse Response;Di2015NewLineSystem.Net.CredentialCache MyCredentialCache;Di2015NewLinestring strRootURI = "http://servername/Exchange/email@test.com/Inbox/";Di2015NewLinestring strUserName = "userName";Di2015NewLinestring strPassword = "password";Di2015NewLinestring strDomain = "domain";Di2015NewLinestring strQuery = "";Di2015NewLinebyte[] bytes = null;Di2015NewLineSystem.IO.Stream RequestStream = null;Di2015NewLineSystem.IO.Stream ResponseStream = null;Di2015NewLineXmlDocument ResponseXmlDoc = null;Di2015NewLineXmlNodeList DisplayNameNodes = null;Di2015NewLineXmlNodeList BodyNodes = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinetryDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    //Build the SQL query.Di2015NewLine    strQuery = "<?xml version=\\"1.0\\"?><D:searchrequest xmlns:D = \\"DAV:\\" >"Di2015NewLine            + "<D:sql>SELECT \\"DAV:displayname\\", \\"http://schemas.microsoft.com/mapi/proptag/x1000001e\\" FROM \\"" + strRootURI + "\\""Di2015NewLine            + "WHERE \\"DAV:ishidden\\" = false AND \\"DAV:isfolder\\" = false"Di2015NewLine            + "</D:sql></D:searchrequest>";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Create a new CredentialCache object and fill it with the networkDi2015NewLine// credentials required to access the server.Di2015NewLineMyCredentialCache = new System.Net.CredentialCache();Di2015NewLineMyCredentialCache.Add(new System.Uri(strRootURI),Di2015NewLine   "NTLM",Di2015NewLine   new System.Net.NetworkCredential(strUserName, strPassword, strDomain)Di2015NewLine   );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Create the HttpWebRequest object.Di2015NewLineRequest = (System.Net.HttpWebRequest)HttpWebRequest.Create(strRootURI);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Add the network credentials to the request.Di2015NewLineRequest.Credentials = MyCredentialCache;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Specify the method.Di2015NewLineRequest.Method = "SEARCH";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Encode the body using UTF-8.Di2015NewLinebytes = Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes((string)strQuery);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Set the content header length.  This must beDi2015NewLine// done before writing data to the request stream.Di2015NewLineRequest.ContentLength = bytes.Length;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Get a reference to the request stream.Di2015NewLineRequestStream = Request.GetRequestStream();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Write the SQL query to the request stream.Di2015NewLineRequestStream.Write(bytes, 0, bytes.Length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Close the Stream object to release the connectionDi2015NewLine// for further use.Di2015NewLineRequestStream.Close();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Set the content type header.Di2015NewLineRequest.ContentType = "text/xml";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Send the SEARCH method request and get theDi2015NewLine// response from the server.Di2015NewLineResponse = (HttpWebResponse)Request.GetResponse();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Get the XML response stream.Di2015NewLineResponseStream = Response.GetResponseStream();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Create the XmlDocument object from the XML response stream.Di2015NewLineResponseXmlDoc = new XmlDocument();Di2015NewLineResponseXmlDoc.Load(ResponseStream);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Build a list of the DAV:href XML nodes, corresponding to the foldersDi2015NewLine// in the mailbox.  The DAV: namespace is typically assgigned the a:Di2015NewLine// prefix in the XML response body.Di2015NewLineDisplayNameNodes = ResponseXmlDoc.GetElementsByTagName("a:displayname");Di2015NewLineBodyNodes = ResponseXmlDoc.GetElementsByTagName("d:x1000001e");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDataTable emails = new DataTable();Di2015NewLineemails.Columns.Add("Subject");Di2015NewLineemails.Columns.Add("Body");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineif (DisplayNameNodes.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("Non-folder item display names...");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Loop through the display name nodes.Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < DisplayNameNodes.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        DataRow row = emails.NewRow();Di2015NewLine        row[0] = DisplayNameNodes[i].InnerText.ToString().Trim();Di2015NewLine        row[1] = BodyNodes[i].InnerText.ToString().Trim();Di2015NewLine        emails.Rows.Add(row);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineelseDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("No non-folder items found...");Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineforeach (DataRow row in emails.Rows)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("Subject: {0}", row["Subject"]);Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("Body: {0}", row["Body"]);Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("-------------------------------------------------------------------");Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Clean up.Di2015NewLineResponseStream.Close();Di2015NewLineResponse.Close();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinecatch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Catch any exceptions. Any error codes from the SEARCHDi2015NewLine    // method request on the server will be caught here, also.Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine(ex.Message);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5011665Di2015UniqueSeparatorstring tidyString = Regex.Replace(originalString, @"(?<=\\r\\n)\\r\\n", "<p/>");Di2015NewLine
5011665Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar sb = new StringBuilder(originalString.Length);Di2015NewLineint startIndex = 0, nextIndex;Di2015NewLinewhile ((nextIndex = originalString.IndexOf("\\r\\n", startIndex)) >= 0)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if ((nextIndex == startIndex) && (startIndex > 0))Di2015NewLine        sb.Append("<p/>");Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine        sb.Append(originalString, startIndex, nextIndex - startIndex + 2);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    startIndex = nextIndex + 2;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinesb.Append(originalString, startIndex, originalString.Length - startIndex);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestring tidyString = sb.ToString();Di2015NewLine

5021907Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic sealed class StaticMethodToValueConverter : IValueConverterDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public object Convert(object value, Type targetType, object parameter, CultureInfo culture)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var methodPath = (parameter as string).Split('.');Di2015NewLine            if (methodPath.Length < 2) return DependencyProperty.UnsetValue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            string methodName = methodPath.Last();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var fullClassPath = new List<string>(methodPath);Di2015NewLine            fullClassPath.RemoveAt(methodPath.Length - 1);Di2015NewLine            Type targetClass = Assembly.GetExecutingAssembly().GetType(String.Join(".", fullClassPath));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var methodInfo = targetClass.GetMethod(methodName, new Type[0]);Di2015NewLine            if (methodInfo == null)Di2015NewLine                return value;Di2015NewLine            return methodInfo.Invoke(null, null);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return DependencyProperty.UnsetValue;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public object ConvertBack(object value, Type targetType, object parameter, CultureInfo culture)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new NotSupportedException("MethodToValueConverter can only be used for one way conversion.");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5024675Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static double GetHeadingError(double initial, double final)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (initial > 360 || initial < 0 || final > 360 || final < 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                //throw some errorDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var diff = final - initial;Di2015NewLine            var absDiff = Math.Abs(diff);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (absDiff <= 180)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                //Edit 1:27pmDi2015NewLine                return absDiff == 180 ? absDiff : diff;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            else if (final > initial)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return absDiff - 360;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return 360 - absDiff;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine

5025665Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic string[] GetPermutations(string input)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    List<string> ret = new List<string>();Di2015NewLine    List<string> cleanInput = new List<string>();Di2015NewLine    foreach (string bit in input.Split('.'))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (bit.Trim().Length > 0) cleanInput.Add(bit.Trim());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    foreach (string bit in cleanInput)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (ret.Count == 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ret.Add(bit);Di2015NewLine            continue;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        List<string> oldRet = ret;Di2015NewLine        ret = new List<string>();Di2015NewLine        foreach (string oldBit in oldRet)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ret.Add(oldBit + bit);Di2015NewLine            ret.Add(oldBit + " " + bit);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return ret.ToArray();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5026238Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static T SafeLimex<T>(Func<T> F, int Timeout, out bool Completed)   Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine       var iar = F.BeginInvoke(null, new object());Di2015NewLine       if (iar.AsyncWaitHandle.WaitOne(Timeout))Di2015NewLine       {Di2015NewLine           Completed = true;Di2015NewLine           return F.EndInvoke(iar);Di2015NewLine       }Di2015NewLine         F.EndInvoke(iar); //not calling EndInvoke will result in a memory leakDi2015NewLine         Completed = false;Di2015NewLine       return default(T);Di2015NewLine   } Di2015NewLine

5026730Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic System.Drawing.Image FixedSize(System.Drawing.Image imgPhoto, int Width, int Height)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLineint sourceWidth = imgPhoto.Width;Di2015NewLineint sourceHeight = imgPhoto.Height;Di2015NewLineint sourceX = 0;Di2015NewLineint sourceY = 0;Di2015NewLineint destX = 0;Di2015NewLineint destY = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinefloat nPercent = 0;Di2015NewLinefloat nPercentW = 0;Di2015NewLinefloat nPercentH = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenPercentW = ((float)Width / (float)sourceWidth);Di2015NewLinenPercentH = ((float)Height / (float)sourceHeight);Di2015NewLineif (nPercentH < nPercentW)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    nPercent = nPercentH;Di2015NewLine    destX = System.Convert.ToInt16((Width -Di2015NewLine                  (sourceWidth * nPercent)) / 2);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineelseDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    nPercent = nPercentW;Di2015NewLine    destY = System.Convert.ToInt16((Height -Di2015NewLine                  (sourceHeight * nPercent)) / 2);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineint destWidth = (int)(sourceWidth * nPercent);Di2015NewLineint destHeight = (int)(sourceHeight * nPercent);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineBitmap bmPhoto = new Bitmap(Width, Height,Di2015NewLine                  PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb);Di2015NewLinebmPhoto.SetResolution(imgPhoto.HorizontalResolution,Di2015NewLine                 imgPhoto.VerticalResolution);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineGraphics grPhoto = Graphics.FromImage(bmPhoto);Di2015NewLinegrPhoto.Clear(Color.White);Di2015NewLinegrPhoto.InterpolationMode = System.Drawing.Drawing2D.InterpolationMode.HighQualityBicubic;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinegrPhoto.DrawImage(imgPhoto,Di2015NewLine    new Rectangle(destX, destY, destWidth, destHeight),Di2015NewLine    new Rectangle(sourceX, sourceY, sourceWidth, sourceHeight),Di2015NewLine    GraphicsUnit.Pixel);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinegrPhoto.Dispose();Di2015NewLinereturn bmPhoto;Di2015NewLine

5031683Di2015UniqueSeparator</p>Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine<pre><code>public class PacketTransitDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static void SendPacket(TcpClient C, object Packet)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        MemoryStream ms = new MemoryStream();Di2015NewLine        XmlSerializer xml = new XmlSerializer(Packet.GetType());Di2015NewLine        xml.Serialize(ms, Packet);Di2015NewLine        ms.Position = 0;Di2015NewLine        byte[] b = ms.GetBuffer();Di2015NewLine        ms.Dispose();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        byte [] sizePacket = BitConverter.GetBytes(b.Length);Di2015NewLine        // Send the 4-byte size packet first.Di2015NewLine        C.Client.Send(sizePacket, sizePacket.Length, SocketFlags.None);Di2015NewLine        C.Client.Send(b, b.Length, SocketFlags.None);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// The string is the XML file that needs to be converted.Di2015NewLine    public static string ReceivePacket(TcpClient C, Type PacketType)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        byte [] FirstTen = new byte[1024];Di2015NewLine        int size = 0;Di2015NewLine        byte[] sizePacket = BitConverter.GetBytes(size);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Get the size packetDi2015NewLine        int sp = C.Client.Receive(sizePacket, sizePacket.Length, SocketFlags.None);Di2015NewLine        if (sp <= 0) return "";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        size = BitConverter.ToInt32(sizePacket, 0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // read until "size" is metDi2015NewLine        StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine        while (size > 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            byte[] b = new byte[1024];Di2015NewLine            int x = size;Di2015NewLine            if (x > 1024) x = 1024;Di2015NewLine            int r = C.Client.Receive(b, x, SocketFlags.None);Di2015NewLine            size -= r;Di2015NewLine            sb.Append(UTF8Encoding.UTF8.GetString(b));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return sb.ToString();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// The XML data that needs to be converted back to the appropriate type.Di2015NewLine    public static object Decode(string PacketData, Type PacketType)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        MemoryStream ms = new MemoryStream(UTF8Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(PacketData));Di2015NewLine        XmlSerializer xml = new XmlSerializer(PacketType);Di2015NewLine        object obj = xml.Deserialize(ms);Di2015NewLine        ms.Dispose();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return obj;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static RequestPacket GetRequestPacket(TcpClient C)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string str = ReceivePacket(C, typeof(RequestPacket));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (str == "") return new RequestPacket();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        RequestPacket req = (RequestPacket) Decode(str, typeof(RequestPacket));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return req;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static ResponsePacket GetResponsePacket(TcpClient C)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string str = ReceivePacket(C, typeof(ResponsePacket));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (str == "") return new ResponsePacket();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        ResponsePacket res = (ResponsePacket)Decode(str, typeof(ResponsePacket));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return res;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5035230Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class TestPrgDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var expression = new RegexParser("a(b|c)*d").Parse();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (var item in expression.Generate())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(item);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static class EnumerableExtensionsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Build a Cartesian product of a sequence of sequencesDi2015NewLine    // Code by Eric Lippert, copied from <http://blogs.msdn.com/b/ericlippert/archive/2010/06/28/computing-a-cartesian-product-with-linq.aspx>Di2015NewLine    public static IEnumerable<IEnumerable<T>> CartesianProduct<T>(this IEnumerable<IEnumerable<T>> sequences)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        IEnumerable<IEnumerable<T>> emptyProduct = new[] { Enumerable.Empty<T>() };Di2015NewLine        return sequences.Aggregate(Di2015NewLine            emptyProduct,Di2015NewLine            (accumulator, sequence) =>Di2015NewLine            from accseq in accumulatorDi2015NewLine            from item in sequenceDi2015NewLine            select accseq.Concat(new[] { item }));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class RegexParserDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private const char EOF = '\\x0000';Di2015NewLine    private readonly string str;Di2015NewLine    private char curr;Di2015NewLine    private int pos;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public RegexParser(string s)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        str = s;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public RegExpression Parse()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        pos = -1;Di2015NewLine        Read();Di2015NewLine        return ParseExpression();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void Read()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ++pos;Di2015NewLine        curr = pos < str.Length ? str[pos] : EOF;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private RegExpression ParseExpression()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var term = ParseTerm();Di2015NewLine        if (curr == '|')Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Read();Di2015NewLine            var secondExpr = ParseExpression();Di2015NewLine            return new Variants(term, secondExpr);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return term;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private RegExpression ParseTerm()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var factor = ParseFactor();Di2015NewLine        if (curr != '|' && curr != '+' && curr != '*' && curr != ')' && curr != EOF)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var secondTerm = ParseTerm();Di2015NewLine            return new Concatenation(factor, secondTerm);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return factor;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private RegExpression ParseFactor()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var element = ParseElement();Di2015NewLine        if (curr == '*')Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Read();Di2015NewLine            return new Repeat(element);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return element;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private RegExpression ParseElement()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        switch (curr)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            case '(':Di2015NewLine                Read();Di2015NewLine                var expr = ParseExpression();Di2015NewLine                if (curr != ')') throw new FormatException("Closing paren expected");Di2015NewLine                Read();Di2015NewLine                return expr;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            case '\\\\':Di2015NewLine                Read();Di2015NewLine                var escapedChar = curr;Di2015NewLine                Read();Di2015NewLine                return new Literal(escapedChar);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            default:Di2015NewLine                var literal = curr;Di2015NewLine                Read();Di2015NewLine                return new Literal(literal);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic abstract class RegExpressionDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    protected static IEnumerable<RegExpression> Merge<T>(RegExpression head, RegExpression tail, Func<T, IEnumerable<RegExpression>> selector)Di2015NewLine        where T : RegExpressionDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var other = tail as T;Di2015NewLine        if (other != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return new[] { head }.Concat(selector(other));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return new[] { head, tail };Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public abstract IEnumerable<string> Generate();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class Variants : RegExpressionDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public IEnumerable<RegExpression> Subexpressions { get; private set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Variants(RegExpression term, RegExpression rest)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Subexpressions = Merge<Variants>(term, rest, c => c.Subexpressions);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override IEnumerable<string> Generate()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return Subexpressions.SelectMany(sub => sub.Generate());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class Concatenation : RegExpressionDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public IEnumerable<RegExpression> Subexpressions { get; private set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Concatenation(RegExpression factor, RegExpression rest)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Subexpressions = Merge<Concatenation>(factor, rest, c => c.Subexpressions);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override IEnumerable<string> Generate()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        foreach (var variant in Subexpressions.Select(sub => sub.Generate()).CartesianProduct())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var builder = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine            foreach (var item in variant) builder.Append(item);Di2015NewLine            yield return builder.ToString();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class Repeat : RegExpressionDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public RegExpression Expr { get; private set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Repeat(RegExpression expr)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Expr = expr;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override IEnumerable<string> Generate()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        foreach (var subexpr in Expr.Generate())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            for (int cnt = 0; cnt < 5; ++cnt)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var builder = new StringBuilder(subexpr.Length * cnt);Di2015NewLine                for (int i = 0; i < cnt; ++i) builder.Append(subexpr);Di2015NewLine                yield return builder.ToString();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class Literal : RegExpressionDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public char Ch { get; private set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Literal(char c)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Ch = c;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override IEnumerable<string> Generate()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        yield return new string(Ch, 1);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5036844Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic abstract class Enumeration : IComparableDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLineprivate readonly int _value;Di2015NewLineprivate readonly string _displayName;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprotected Enumeration()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprotected Enumeration(int value, string displayName)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    _value = value;Di2015NewLine    _displayName = displayName;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic int ValueDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    get { return _value; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic string DisplayNameDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    get { return _displayName; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic override string ToString()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return DisplayName;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static IEnumerable<T> GetAll<T>() where T : Enumeration, new()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var type = typeof(T);Di2015NewLine    var fields = type.GetFields(BindingFlags.Public | BindingFlags.Static | BindingFlags.DeclaredOnly);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (var info in fields)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var instance = new T();Di2015NewLine        var locatedValue = info.GetValue(instance) as T;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (locatedValue != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            yield return locatedValue;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic override bool Equals(object obj)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var otherValue = obj as Enumeration;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (otherValue == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var typeMatches = GetType().Equals(obj.GetType());Di2015NewLine    var valueMatches = _value.Equals(otherValue.Value);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return typeMatches && valueMatches;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic override int GetHashCode()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return _value.GetHashCode();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static int AbsoluteDifference(Enumeration firstValue, Enumeration secondValue)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var absoluteDifference = Math.Abs(firstValue.Value - secondValue.Value);Di2015NewLine    return absoluteDifference;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static T FromValue<T>(int value) where T : Enumeration, new()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var matchingItem = parse<T, int>(value, "value", item => item.Value == value);Di2015NewLine    return matchingItem;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static T FromDisplayName<T>(string displayName) where T : Enumeration, new()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var matchingItem = parse<T, string>(displayName, "display name", item => item.DisplayName == displayName);Di2015NewLine    return matchingItem;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static T parse<T, K>(K value, string description, Func<T, bool> predicate) where T : Enumeration, new()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var matchingItem = GetAll<T>().FirstOrDefault(predicate);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (matchingItem == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var message = string.Format("'{0}' is not a valid {1} in {2}", value, description, typeof(T));Di2015NewLine        throw new ApplicationException(message);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return matchingItem;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic int CompareTo(object other)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return Value.CompareTo(((Enumeration)other).Value);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5040956Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic IQueryable<WebFile> GetFiles()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            string path = "~/Upload";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            List<WebFile> webFiles = new List<WebFile>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(path)) return webFiles.AsQueryable();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            DirectoryInfo di = new DirectoryInfo(HttpContext.Current.Server.MapPath(path));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            foreach (FileInfo file in di.GetFiles())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                webFiles.Add(new WebFile { FileName = file.Name });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return webFiles.AsQueryable();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public void InsertFile(WebFile file)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            FileHandler.HandleFile(file);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine
5040956Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class FileHandlerDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public static void HandleFile(WebFile file)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            string uploadDir = "~/Upload";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(uploadDir))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (uploadDir.IndexOf("~/") == 0)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    uploadDir = HttpContext.Current.Server.MapPath(uploadDir);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (uploadDir.LastIndexOf("/") == uploadDir.Length - 1)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    uploadDir = uploadDir.Substring(0, uploadDir.Length - 1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                string fullFileName = string.Format("{0}/{1}", uploadDir, file.FileName);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (File.Exists(fullFileName))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    string ext = fullFileName.Substring(fullFileName.LastIndexOf("."));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    string fName = fullFileName.Substring(0, fullFileName.LastIndexOf("."));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    fullFileName = string.Format("{0}_1{1}", fName, ext);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                File.WriteAllBytes(fullFileName, file.FileContent);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

5041077Di2015UniqueSeparator@WebService
5041092Di2015UniqueSeparator   public class PCQueue : IDisposableDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      BlockingCollection<Action> _taskQ = new BlockingCollection<Action>(); Di2015NewLine      public PCQueue (int workerCount)Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        // Create and start a separate Task for each consumer:Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < workerCount; i++)Di2015NewLine          Task.Factory.StartNew (Consume);Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      public void Dispose() { _taskQ.CompleteAdding(); }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      public void EnqueueTask (Action action) { _taskQ.Add (action); }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      void Consume()Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        // This sequence that were enumerating will block when no elementsDi2015NewLine        // are available and will end when CompleteAdding is called. Di2015NewLine        foreach (Action action in _taskQ.GetConsumingEnumerable())Di2015NewLine          action();     // Perform task.Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
5041375Di2015UniqueSeparator{ .. }

5043840Di2015UniqueSeparatorIEnumerable<Tuple<double, double>> Average(List<Tuple<double, double>> A, List<Tuple<double, double>> B)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (A == null || B == null || A.Any(p => p == null) || B.Any(p => p == null)) throw new ArgumentException();Di2015NewLine    Func<double, double> square = d => d * d;//squares its argumentDi2015NewLine    Func<int, int, double> euclidianDistance = (a, b) => Math.Sqrt(square(A[a].Item1 - B[b].Item1) + square(A[a].Item2 - B[b].Item2));//computes the distance from A[first argument] to B[second argument]Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int previousIndexInB = 0;Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < A.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        double distance = euclidianDistance(i, previousIndexInB);//distance between A[i] and B[j - 1], initially Di2015NewLine        for (int j = previousIndexInB + 1; j < B.Count; j++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var distance2 = euclidianDistance(i, j);//distance between A[i] and B[j]Di2015NewLine            if (distance2 < distance)//if it's closer than the previously checked point, keep searching. Otherwise stop the search and return an interpolated point.Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                distance = distance2;Di2015NewLine                previousIndexInB = j;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                break;//don't place the yield return statement here, because that could go wrong at the end of B.Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        yield return LinearInterpolation(A[i], B[previousIndexInB]);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineTuple<double, double> LinearInterpolation(Tuple<double, double> a, Tuple<double, double> b)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return new Tuple<double, double>((a.Item1 + b.Item1) / 2, (a.Item2 + b.Item2) / 2);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
5043840Di2015UniqueSeparatorIEnumerable<Tuple<double, double>> Average(List<List<Tuple<double, double>>> data)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (data == null || data.Count < 2 || data.Any(list => list == null || list.Any(p => p == null))) throw new ArgumentException();Di2015NewLine    Func<double, double> square = d => d * d;Di2015NewLine    Func<Tuple<double, double>, Tuple<double, double>, double> euclidianDistance = (a, b) => Math.Sqrt(square(a.Item1 - b.Item1) + square(a.Item2 - b.Item2));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var firstList = data[0];Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < firstList.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int[] previousIndices = new int[data.Count];//the indices of points which are closest to the previous point firstList[i - 1]. Di2015NewLine        //(or zero if i == 0). This is kept track of per list, except the first list.Di2015NewLine        var closests = new Tuple<double, double>[data.Count];//an array of points used for caching, of which the average will be yielded.Di2015NewLine        closests[0] = firstList[i];Di2015NewLine        for (int listIndex = 1; listIndex < data.Count; listIndex++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var list = data[listIndex];Di2015NewLine            double distance = euclidianDistance(firstList[i], list[previousIndices[listIndex]]);Di2015NewLine            for (int j = previousIndices[listIndex] + 1; j < list.Count; j++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var distance2 = euclidianDistance(firstList[i], list[j]);Di2015NewLine                if (distance2 < distance)//if it's closer than the previously checked point, keep searching. Otherwise stop the search and return an interpolated point.Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    distance = distance2;Di2015NewLine                    previousIndices[listIndex] = j;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            closests[listIndex] = list[previousIndices[listIndex]];Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        yield return new Tuple<double, double>(closests.Select(p => p.Item1).Average(), closests.Select(p => p.Item2).Average());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5044723Di2015UniqueSeparatorpbuffer.cpp
5044723Di2015UniqueSeparator#include <stdexcept>Di2015NewLine#include <GL/glew.h>Di2015NewLine#include "pbuffer.h"Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineusing namespace std;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine#ifdef WIN32Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinePBuffer::PBuffer(int width, int height)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    initialized=false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    this->width=width;Di2015NewLine    this->height=height;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    hGLDC = wglGetCurrentDC();Di2015NewLine    hGLRC = wglGetCurrentContext();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Create();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinePBuffer::~PBuffer()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Destroy();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevoid PBuffer::Use()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // make sure the pbuffer has been initializedDi2015NewLine    if (!initialized)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw runtime_error("pbuffer is not initialized");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    // make sure we haven't lost our pbuffer due to a display mode changeDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int flag = 0;Di2015NewLine    wglQueryPbufferARB(hPB, WGL_PBUFFER_LOST_ARB, &flag);Di2015NewLine    if (flag)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw runtime_error("pbuffer became invalid");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    wglMakeCurrent(hPBDC, hPBRC);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    glViewport(0, 0, width, height);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    glDrawBuffer(GL_FRONT);Di2015NewLine        glReadBuffer(GL_FRONT);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevoid PBuffer::Release()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // make sure the pbuffer has been initializedDi2015NewLine    if ( !initialized )Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw runtime_error("pbuffer is not initialized");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    // make sure we haven't lost our pbuffer due to a display mode changeDi2015NewLine    int flag = 0;Di2015NewLine    wglQueryPbufferARB(hPB, WGL_PBUFFER_LOST_ARB, &flag);Di2015NewLine    if (flag)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw runtime_error("pbuffer became invalid");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    wglMakeCurrent(hGLDC, hGLRC);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevoid PBuffer::Create()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if(initialized)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Destroy();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (hGLDC == NULL)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw runtime_error("unable to get device context");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if (hGLRC == NULL)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw runtime_error("unable to get render context");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    // define the minimum pixel format requirements we will need for our pbufferDi2015NewLine    // a pbuffer is just like a frame buffer, it can have a depth buffer associatedDi2015NewLine    // with it and it can be double buffered.Di2015NewLine    int attr[] =Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        WGL_SUPPORT_OPENGL_ARB, TRUE, // pbuffer will be used with glDi2015NewLine        WGL_DRAW_TO_PBUFFER_ARB, TRUE, // enable render to pbufferDi2015NewLine        WGL_RED_BITS_ARB, 16, // at least 8 bits for RED channelDi2015NewLine        WGL_GREEN_BITS_ARB, 16, // at least 8 bits for GREEN channelDi2015NewLine        WGL_BLUE_BITS_ARB, 16, // at least 8 bits for BLUE channelDi2015NewLine        WGL_ALPHA_BITS_ARB, 16, // at least 8 bits for ALPHA channelDi2015NewLine        WGL_DEPTH_BITS_ARB, 24, // at least 24 bits for depth bufferDi2015NewLine        WGL_DOUBLE_BUFFER_ARB, FALSE, // we dont require double bufferingDi2015NewLine        0 // zero terminates the listDi2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // choose a pixel format that meets our minimum requirementsDi2015NewLine    unsigned int count = 0;Di2015NewLine    int pixelFormat;Di2015NewLine    wglChoosePixelFormatARB(hGLDC,(const int*)attr, NULL, 1,&pixelFormat,&count);Di2015NewLine    if(count == 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw runtime_error("no matching pbuffer pixel format found");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int attribs[]={0,0};Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // allocate the pbufferDi2015NewLine    hPB = wglCreatePbufferARB(hGLDC, pixelFormat, width, height, attribs);Di2015NewLine    hPBDC = wglGetPbufferDCARB(hPB);Di2015NewLine    hPBRC = wglCreateContext(hPBDC);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    wglShareLists(hGLRC, hPBRC);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    initialized=true;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevoid PBuffer::Destroy()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // make sure the pbuffer has been initializedDi2015NewLine    if ( !initialized )Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw runtime_error("pbuffer is not initialized");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Release();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    wglDeleteContext(hPBRC);Di2015NewLine    wglReleasePbufferDCARB(hPB, hPBDC);Di2015NewLine    wglDestroyPbufferARB(hPB);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    initialized = false;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine#endifDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine#ifdef GLXDi2015NewLinePBuffer::PBuffer(int width, int height)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    initialized=false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    this->width=width;Di2015NewLine        this->height=height;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    dpy = glXGetCurrentDisplay();Di2015NewLine    scrnum = DefaultScreen( dpy );Di2015NewLine    FBRC = glXGetCurrentContext();Di2015NewLine    FBDC = glXGetCurrentDrawable();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Create();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinePBuffer::~PBuffer()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Destroy();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevoid PBuffer::Use()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // make sure the pbuffer has been initializedDi2015NewLine    if (!initialized)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw runtime_error("pbuffer is not initialized");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    // make sure we haven't lost our pbuffer due to a display mode changeDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // resize view port. generally you'll want to set this to theDi2015NewLine    // size of your pbuffer so that you render to the entire pbufferDi2015NewLine    // but there are cases where you might want to render to just aDi2015NewLine    // sub-region of the pbuffer.Di2015NewLine    glXMakeContextCurrent(dpy, PBDC, PBDC, PBRC);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    glViewport(0, 0, width, height);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    glDrawBuffer(GL_FRONT);Di2015NewLine    glReadBuffer(GL_FRONT);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevoid PBuffer::Release()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // make sure the pbuffer has been initializedDi2015NewLine    if ( !initialized )Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw runtime_error("pbuffer is not initialized");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    // make sure we haven't lost our pbuffer due to a display mode changeDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    glXMakeContextCurrent(dpy, FBDC, FBDC, FBRC);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevoid PBuffer::Create()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if(initialized)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Destroy();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (dpy == NULL)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw runtime_error("unable to get device context");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if (!FBDC)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw runtime_error("unable to get render context");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    // GLX_WINDOW_BIT,Di2015NewLine        GLX_DOUBLEBUFFER, False,Di2015NewLine        GLX_RED_SIZE, 1,Di2015NewLine        GLX_GREEN_SIZE, 1,Di2015NewLine        GLX_BLUE_SIZE, 1,Di2015NewLine        GLX_ALPHA_SIZE, 1,Di2015NewLine        GLX_DEPTH_SIZE, 1,Di2015NewLine        0 // zero terminates the listDi2015NewLine    };*/Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int attrib[] =Di2015NewLine GLX_ALPHA_SIZE,    8,Di2015NewLine        GLX_STENCIL_SIZE,  1,Di2015NewLine        GLX_DEPTH_SIZE,    24,Di2015NewLine        GLX_RENDER_TYPE,   GLX_RGBA_BIT,Di2015NewLine        GLX_DRAWABLE_TYPE, GLX_PBUFFER_BIT | GLX_WINDOW_BIT,Di2015NewLine        NoneDi2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int PBattrib[] =Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        GLX_PBUFFER_WIDTH, 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw runtime_error("no matching pbuffer pixel format found");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // allocate the pbufferDi2015NewLine 5045235Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic virtual PagedList<T> GetPagedData<T>(int startIndex, int count,Di2015NewLine               Expression<Func<T, bool>> predicate) where T : classDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var query = session.Query<T>().Where(predicate);Di2015NewLine    var rowCount = query.Count();Di2015NewLine    var page = query.Skip(startIndex).Take(count).List<T>();Di2015NewLine    return new PagedList<T>(pageOfItems, startIndex, count, rowCount);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5045466Di2015UniqueSeparatorTreeView
5045466Di2015UniqueSeparatorOK, create a listview and a treeview.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineIn my example, the listview is called listView1 and the treeview is called tvMain.Di2015NewLineOn the treeview, set AllowDrop to true.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineCreate an ItemDrag event on the listview:Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate void listView1_ItemDrag(object sender, ItemDragEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            listView1.DoDragDrop(listView1.SelectedItems, DragDropEffects.Copy);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineIn this example items from the listview are copied to the 'drop' object.Di2015NewLineNow, create a DragEnter event on the treeview:Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate void tvMain_DragEnter(object sender, DragEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            e.Effect = DragDropEffects.Copy;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineThis was easy. Now the hard part starts. The following code adds the selected (and dragged) listview items to an existing node (make sure you have at least one node already in your treeview or the example will fail!)Di2015NewLineCreate a DragDrop event on the treeview:Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate void tvMain_DragDrop(object sender, DragEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            TreeNode n;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (e.Data.GetDataPresent("System.Windows.Forms.ListView+SelectedListViewItemCollection", false))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Point pt = ((TreeView)sender).PointToClient(new Point(e.X, e.Y));Di2015NewLine                TreeNode dn = ((TreeView)sender).GetNodeAt(pt);Di2015NewLine                ListView.SelectedListViewItemCollection lvi = (ListView.SelectedListViewItemCollection)e.Data.GetData("System.Windows.Forms.ListView+SelectedListViewItemCollection");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                foreach (ListViewItem item in lvi)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    n = new TreeNode(item.Text);Di2015NewLine                    n.Tag = item;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    dn.Nodes.Add((TreeNode)n.Clone());Di2015NewLine                    dn.Expand();Di2015NewLine                    n.Remove();Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineTo change the cursor while dragging, you have to create a GiveFeedback event for the ListView control:Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate void listView1_GiveFeedback(object sender, GiveFeedbackEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            e.UseDefaultCursors = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (e.Effect == DragDropEffects.Copy)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Cursor.Current = new Cursor(@"myfile.ico");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinemyfile.ico should be in the same directory as the .exe file.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineThis is just a simple example. You can extend it any way you like.Di2015NewLineI hope this helps. Di2015NewLine

5048856Di2015UniqueSeparatorException   mostRecentEx = null;Di2015NewLinefor(int i=0; i<5; i++)  // Attempt a maximum of 5 times Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine       ...Di2015NewLine       double result = client.Add(value1, value2);Di2015NewLine       ...Di2015NewLine       client.Close();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // The following is typically thrown on the client when a channel is terminated due to the server closing the connection.Di2015NewLine    catch (ChannelTerminatedException cte)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      mostRecentEx = cte;Di2015NewLine      secureSecretService.Abort();Di2015NewLine        //  delay (backoff) and retry Di2015NewLine        Thread.Sleep(1000 * (i + 1)); Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // The following is thrown when a remote endpoint could not be found or reached. 5050026Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System.Threading.Tasks;Di2015NewLine
5050026Di2015UniqueSeparatorTask
5050034Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static bool injectMemory(IntPtr windowHandle, byte[] buffer, out IntPtr hndProc, out IntPtr lpAddress)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        hndProc = IntPtr.Zero;Di2015NewLine        lpAddress = IntPtr.Zero;Di2015NewLine        //open local process objectDi2015NewLine        Process mainWindowProcess = FindProcess(windowHandle);Di2015NewLine        hndProc = OpenProcess(Di2015NewLine            (0x2 | 0x8 | 0x10 | 0x20 | 0x400), //create thread, query info, operation Di2015NewLine            //write, and read Di2015NewLine            1,Di2015NewLine            (uint)mainWindowProcess.Id);Di2015NewLine        if (hndProc == (IntPtr)0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Unable to attach process");Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        //allocate memory for process objectDi2015NewLine        lpAddress = VirtualAllocEx(hndProc, (IntPtr)null, (uint)buffer.Length,Di2015NewLine             AllocationType.Commit | AllocationType.Reserve, MemoryProtection.ExecuteReadWrite);Di2015NewLine        if (lpAddress == (IntPtr)0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Unable to allocate memory to target proces");Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        //wite dataDi2015NewLine        uint wrotelen = 0;Di2015NewLine        WriteProcessMemory(hndProc, lpAddress, buffer, (uint)buffer.Length, out wrotelen);Di2015NewLine        if (Marshal.GetLastWin32Error() != 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Unable to write memory to process.");Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
5050034Di2015UniqueSeparator        int structMemLen =  Marshal.SizeOf(typeof(SYSTEMTIME));Di2015NewLine        byte[] buffer = new byte[structMemLen];Di2015NewLine        ushort GDT_VALID = 0;Di2015NewLine        SYSTEMTIME sysTime = new SYSTEMTIME();Di2015NewLine        //Assign the values as you preferDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        IntPtr dataPtr = Marshal.AllocHGlobal(structMemLen);Di2015NewLine        Marshal.StructureToPtr(sysTime, dataPtr, true);Di2015NewLine        Marshal.Copy(dataPtr, buffer, 0, structMemLen);Di2015NewLine        Marshal.FreeHGlobal(dataPtr);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        IntPtr hndProc = IntPtr.Zero;Di2015NewLine        IntPtr lpAddress = IntPtr.Zero;Di2015NewLine        injectMemory(mainWindowHandle, buffer, out hndProc, out lpAddress); Di2015NewLine        SendMessage(handle, DTM_SETSYSTEMTIME, (IntPtr)GDT_VALID, lpAddress);Di2015NewLine        CloseHandle(hndProc);Di2015NewLine

VALUESDi2015NewLine               (contactAddressID.NextVal, 1, 1, 287, 'Blooper St', 'New Yor')";Di2015NewLine        command.ExecuteNonQuery();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        transaction.Commit();Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Both records are written to database.");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    catch (Exception e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine 5052852Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic string GetWebResponse(string url, NameValueCollection parameters)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  var httpWebRequest = (HttpWebRequest)WebRequest.Create(url);Di2015NewLine  httpWebRequest.ContentType = "application/x-www-form-urlencoded";Di2015NewLine  httpWebRequest.Method = "POST";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  var sb = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine  foreach (var key in parameters.AllKeys)Di2015NewLine    sb.Append(key + "=" + parameters[key] + "&");Di2015NewLine  sb.Length = sb.Length - 1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  byte[] requestBytes = Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(sb.ToString());Di2015NewLine  httpWebRequest.ContentLength = requestBytes.Length;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  using (var requestStream = httpWebRequest.GetRequestStream())Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    requestStream.Write(requestBytes, 0, requestBytes.Length);Di2015NewLine    requestStream.Close();Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  Task<WebResponse> responseTask = Task.Factory.FromAsync<WebResponse>(httpWebRequest.BeginGetResponse, httpWebRequest.EndGetResponse, null);Di2015NewLine  using (var responseStream = responseTask.Result.GetResponseStream())Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    var reader = new StreamReader(responseStream);Di2015NewLine    return reader.ReadToEnd();Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5054051Di2015UniqueSeparator// **** Start definition of the class bcdb_Globals ****Di2015NewLinepublic static class MyGlobalsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static Dictionary<string, int> _month2Int = new Dictionary<string, int>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        {"January", 1},Di2015NewLine        {"February", 2},Di2015NewLine        {"March", 3},Di2015NewLine        {"April", 4},Di2015NewLine        {"May", 5},Di2015NewLine        {"June", 6},Di2015NewLine        {"July", 7},Di2015NewLine        {"August", 8},Di2015NewLine        {"September", 9},Di2015NewLine        {"October", 10},Di2015NewLine        {"November", 11},Di2015NewLine        {"December", 12}Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLine    static public int GetMonthAsInt(string month)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return( _month2Int[month] );Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class MyClassDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static char[] gDateSeparators = new char[2] { ',', ' ' };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static Regex gDayRegex = new Regex("[0-9][0-9]?(st|nd|rd|th)");Di2015NewLine    static Regex gMonthRegex = new Regex("January|February|March|April|May|June|July|August|September|October|November|December");Di2015NewLine    static Regex gYearRegex = new Regex("[0-9]{4}");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void ParseMatchDate(string matchDate)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Stack matchDateTimes = new Stack();Di2015NewLine        string[] tokens = matchDate.Split(gDateSeparators,StringSplitOptions.RemoveEmptyEntries);Di2015NewLine        int curYear = int.MinValue;Di2015NewLine        int curMonth = int.MinValue;Di2015NewLine        int curDay = int.MinValue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int pos = tokens.Length-1; pos >= 0; --pos)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (gYearRegex.IsMatch(tokens[pos]))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                curYear = int.Parse(tokens[pos]);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else if (gMonthRegex.IsMatch(tokens[pos]))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                curMonth = MyGlobals.GetMonthAsInt(tokens[pos]);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else if (gDayRegex.IsMatch(tokens[pos]))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                string tok = tokens[pos];Di2015NewLine                curDay = int.Parse(tok.Substring(0,(tok.Length-2)));Di2015NewLine                // Dates are in reverse order, so using a stack means we'll pull em off in the correct orderDi2015NewLine                matchDateTimes.Push(new DateTime(curYear, curMonth, curDay));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Now get the datetimesDi2015NewLine        while (matchDateTimes.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Do something with dates hereDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

5059235Di2015UniqueSeparator    string ReplaceNewLinesWithBrIfNotInsideDiv(string input) {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int divNestingLevel = 0;Di2015NewLine        StringBuilder output = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine        StringComparison comp = StringComparison.InvariantCultureIgnoreCase;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < input.Length; i++) {Di2015NewLine            if (input[i] == '<') {Di2015NewLine                if (i < (input.Length - 3) && input.Substring(i, 4).Equals("<div", comp)){Di2015NewLine                    divNestingLevel++;Di2015NewLine                } else if (divNestingLevel != 0 && i < (input.Length - 5) && input.Substring(i, 6).Equals("</div>", comp)) {Di2015NewLine                    divNestingLevel--;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (input[i] == '\\n' && divNestingLevel == 0) {Di2015NewLine                output.Append("<br/>");Di2015NewLine            } else {Di2015NewLine                output.Append(input[i]);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return output.ToString();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

5064516Di2015UniqueSeparator  // You can use "using" blocks guarantee streams are disposed (like try/finally { boas.Close(); })Di2015NewLine  using (var baos = new MemoryStream())Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    // Stream encodes as UTF-8 by default; specify other encodings in this constructorDi2015NewLine    using (var ps = new StreamWriter(baos))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      // Format string almost the same, but 'tt' for 'am/pm'Di2015NewLine      // Could also use move formatting intoDi2015NewLine      //    DateTime.Now.ToString("MM/dd/yyyy HH:mm:ss tt")Di2015NewLine      // or ToLongDateString and ToLongTimeString for locale-defined formatsDi2015NewLine      ps.Write("\\n\\n+++++ {0} {1:MM/dd/yyyy HH:mm:ss tt}\\n", Environment.UserName, DateTime.Now);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      // Need to close or flush the StreamWriter stream before the bytes willDi2015NewLine      // appear in the MemoryStreamDi2015NewLine      ps.Close();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Extract bytes from MemoryStreamDi2015NewLine    var bytes = baos.ToArray();Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine

5066519Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass LockManagerDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private static Object managerLock = new Object();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static Dictionary<string, int> fileLocks = new Dictionary<string, int>();Di2015NewLine    private static Dictionary<string, int> folderLocks = new Dictionary<string, int>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void EnterFolderLock(string folderPath)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Monitor.Enter(managerLock);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        string aLocked;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // test if all subfolders are not lockedDi2015NewLine        doDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            aLocked = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            foreach (KeyValuePair<string, int> folderLock in folderLocks)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // if it is in a locked folderDi2015NewLine                if (folderPath.Contains(folderLock.Key))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    aLocked = folderLock.Key;Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                else if (folderLock.Key.Contains(folderPath))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    aLocked = folderLock.Key;Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (aLocked == null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                foreach (KeyValuePair<string, int> fileLock in fileLocks)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // if it has a locked fileDi2015NewLine                    if (fileLock.Key.Contains(folderPath))Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        aLocked = fileLock.Key;Di2015NewLine                        break;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (aLocked != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Monitor.Exit(managerLock);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // wait until the lock was releasedDi2015NewLine                Monitor.Enter(aLocked);Di2015NewLine                Monitor.Exit(aLocked);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                Monitor.Enter(managerLock);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        } while (aLocked != null);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (folderLocks.ContainsKey(folderPath))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            folderLocks[folderPath] = folderLocks[folderPath] + 1;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            folderLocks.Add(folderPath, 1);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Monitor.Exit(managerLock);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // get the file lockDi2015NewLine        Monitor.Enter(folderPath);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void EnterFileLock(string filePath)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Monitor.Enter(managerLock);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        string aLockedFolder;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // test if all subfolders are not lockedDi2015NewLine        doDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            aLockedFolder = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            foreach (KeyValuePair<string, int> folderLock in folderLocks)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // if it is in a locked folderDi2015NewLine                if (filePath.Contains(folderLock.Key))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    aLockedFolder = folderLock.Key;Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (aLockedFolder != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Monitor.Exit(managerLock);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // wait until the lock was releasedDi2015NewLine                Monitor.Enter(aLockedFolder);Di2015NewLine                Monitor.Exit(aLockedFolder);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                Monitor.Enter(managerLock);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        } while (aLockedFolder != null);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (fileLocks.ContainsKey(filePath))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            fileLocks[filePath] = fileLocks[filePath] + 1;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            fileLocks.Add(filePath, 1);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Monitor.Exit(managerLock);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // get the file lockDi2015NewLine        Monitor.Enter(filePath);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void ExitFolderLock(string folderPath)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Monitor.Enter(managerLock);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (!folderLocks.ContainsKey(folderPath))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // key is missing!!!Di2015NewLine            throw new Exception("Can't exit this folder lock if it's not open!");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if (folderLocks[folderPath] == 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // key is missing!!!Di2015NewLine            throw new Exception("Can't exit this folder lock if it's not open! Something strange happened. Please debug.");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if (folderLocks[folderPath] == 1)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // last entry removeDi2015NewLine            folderLocks.Remove(folderPath);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            folderLocks[folderPath] = folderLocks[folderPath] - 1;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Monitor.Exit(folderPath);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Monitor.Exit(managerLock);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void ExitFileLock(string filePath)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Monitor.Enter(managerLock);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (!fileLocks.ContainsKey(filePath))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // key is missing!!!Di2015NewLine            throw new Exception("Can't exit this file lock if it's not open!");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if (fileLocks[filePath] == 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // key is missing!!!Di2015NewLine            throw new Exception("Can't exit this file lock if it's not open! Something strange happened. Please debug.");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if (fileLocks[filePath] == 1)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // last entry removeDi2015NewLine            fileLocks.Remove(filePath);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            fileLocks[filePath] = fileLocks[filePath] - 1;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Monitor.Exit(filePath);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Monitor.Exit(managerLock);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5068617Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass Data // The main class to store data inDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int x;Di2015NewLine    public Data() { this.x = 0; }Di2015NewLine    public int NumberDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return x; }Di2015NewLine        set { x = value; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public int SquareDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return x * x; }Di2015NewLine        set { x = (int)Math.Sqrt(value); }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public void FromNumberStore(NumberMemento mem)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.Number = mem.Number;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public void FromSqureStore(SquareMemento mem)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.Square = mem.Square;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine[Serializable]Di2015NewLineclass NumberMemento // memento #1Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int x;Di2015NewLine    public NumberMemento() { x = 0; }Di2015NewLine    public NumberMemento(Data data)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.x = data.Number;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public int NumberDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return x; }Di2015NewLine        set { x = value; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine[Serializable]Di2015NewLineclass SquareMemento // memento #2Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int x2;Di2015NewLine    public SquareMemento() { x2 = 0; }Di2015NewLine    public SquareMemento(Data data)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.x2 = data.Square;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public int SquareDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return x2; }Di2015NewLine        set { x2 = value; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineclass Program // Sample code to check all around serialization.Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Data store = new Data();Di2015NewLine        store.Number = 9;Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Write and read based on numberDi2015NewLine            NumberMemento mem1 = new NumberMemento(store);Di2015NewLine            BinaryFormatter bf1 = new BinaryFormatter();Di2015NewLine            FileStream fs = new FileStream("numstore.dat", FileMode.Create);Di2015NewLine            bf1.Serialize(fs, mem1);Di2015NewLine            fs.Close();Di2015NewLine            // clear data and deserializeDi2015NewLine            store.Number = 0;Di2015NewLine            fs = new FileStream("numstore.dat", FileMode.Open);Di2015NewLine            mem1 = bf1.Deserialize(fs) as NumberMemento;Di2015NewLine            fs.Close();Di2015NewLine            store.FromNumberStore(mem1);Di2015NewLine            // check store.Number == 9Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Write and read based on squareDi2015NewLine            SquareMemento mem2 = new SquareMemento(store);Di2015NewLine            BinaryFormatter bf2 = new BinaryFormatter();Di2015NewLine            FileStream fs = new FileStream("sqrstore.dat", FileMode.Create);Di2015NewLine            bf2.Serialize(fs, mem2);Di2015NewLine            fs.Close();Di2015NewLine            // clear data and deserializeDi2015NewLine            store.Number = 0;Di2015NewLine            fs = new FileStream("sqrstore.dat", FileMode.Open);Di2015NewLine            mem2 = bf2.Deserialize(fs) as SquareMemento;Di2015NewLine            fs.Close();Di2015NewLine            store.FromSqureStore(mem2);Di2015NewLine            // check store.Number == 9Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5069428Di2015UniqueSeparatorsealed class WarnCodeProcessorDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private static Dictionary<int, WarnCodeValue> warnCodesDictionary;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static volatile WarnCodeProcessor _instance;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static object instanceLockCheck = new object();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static WarnCodeProcessor InstanceDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        getDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            lock (instanceLockCheck)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (_instance == null)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    _instance = new WarnCodeProcessor();Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return _instance;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private WarnCodeProcessor()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        warnCodesDictionary = new Dictionary<int, WarnCodeValue>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        string currentDirectory = Path.GetDirectoryName(Assembly.GetExecutingAssembly().Location);Di2015NewLine        string settingsFilePath = Path.Combine(currentDirectory, "WarnCodes.xml");Di2015NewLine        XElement rootElement = XElement.Load(settingsFilePath);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        warnCodesDictionary = GetChildren(rootElement, string.Empty);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public string GetConcatenatedMeaning(int code)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string concatenatedMeaning = string.Empty;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int firstLevel = code & 0xF000;Di2015NewLine        int secondLevel = code & 0xFF00;Di2015NewLine        int thirdLevel = code & 0xFFF0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (warnCodesDictionary.ContainsKey(firstLevel))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            concatenatedMeaning = warnCodesDictionary[firstLevel].ConcatenatedMeaning;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (warnCodesDictionary[firstLevel].ChildNodes != null &&Di2015NewLine                warnCodesDictionary[firstLevel].ChildNodes.ContainsKey(secondLevel))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                concatenatedMeaning = Di2015NewLine                    warnCodesDictionary[firstLevel].Di2015NewLine                    ChildNodes[secondLevel].ConcatenatedMeaning;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (warnCodesDictionary[firstLevel].ChildNodes[secondLevel].ChildNodes != null &&Di2015NewLine                    warnCodesDictionary[firstLevel].ChildNodes[secondLevel].ChildNodes.ContainsKey(thirdLevel))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    concatenatedMeaning = Di2015NewLine                        warnCodesDictionary[firstLevel].Di2015NewLine                        ChildNodes[secondLevel].Di2015NewLine                        ChildNodes[thirdLevel].ConcatenatedMeaning;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    if (warnCodesDictionary[firstLevel].ChildNodes[secondLevel].ChildNodes[thirdLevel].ChildNodes != null &&Di2015NewLine                        warnCodesDictionary[firstLevel].ChildNodes[secondLevel].ChildNodes[thirdLevel].ChildNodes.ContainsKey(code))Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        concatenatedMeaning = Di2015NewLine                            warnCodesDictionary[firstLevel].Di2015NewLine                            ChildNodes[secondLevel].Di2015NewLine                            ChildNodes[thirdLevel].Di2015NewLine                            ChildNodes[code].ConcatenatedMeaning;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return concatenatedMeaning;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static Dictionary<int, WarnCodeValue> GetChildren(XElement element, string concatenatedMeaning)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string elementMeaning = string.Empty;Di2015NewLine        XAttribute attribute = element.Attribute("meaning");Di2015NewLine        if (attribute != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            elementMeaning = attribute.Value;Di2015NewLine            concatenatedMeaning =Di2015NewLine                string.IsNullOrEmpty(concatenatedMeaning) ? elementMeaning : string.Format("{0} : {1}", concatenatedMeaning, elementMeaning);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (element.Descendants().Count() > 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Dictionary<int, WarnCodeValue> childNodeDictionary = new Dictionary<int, WarnCodeValue>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            foreach (XElement childElement in element.Elements())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                int hex = Convert.ToInt32(childElement.Attribute("hex").Value, 16);Di2015NewLine                string meaning = childElement.Attribute("meaning").Value;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                Dictionary<int, WarnCodeValue> dictionary = GetChildren(childElement, concatenatedMeaning);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                WarnCodeValue warnCodeValue = new WarnCodeValue();Di2015NewLine                warnCodeValue.ChildNodes = dictionary;Di2015NewLine                warnCodeValue.Meaning = meaning;Di2015NewLine                warnCodeValue.ConcatenatedMeaning =Di2015NewLine                    string.IsNullOrEmpty(concatenatedMeaning) ? meaning : string.Format("{0} : {1}", concatenatedMeaning, meaning);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                childNodeDictionary.Add(hex, warnCodeValue);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return childNodeDictionary;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return null;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5070622Di2015UniqueSeparator    internal static void TranslateThis(Player player, string fromLang, string toLang, string text){Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string translated = null;Di2015NewLine            text = Regex.Replace(text, @"[^\\w\\.\\'\\s@-]", "");Di2015NewLine            HttpWebRequest request = (HttpWebRequest)WebRequest.Create("http://translate.google.com/?langpair=" + fromLang + "|" + toLang + "&text=" + text.Replace(" ", "+") + "#");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            request.MaximumAutomaticRedirections = 4;Di2015NewLine            request.MaximumResponseHeadersLength = 4;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            request.Credentials = CredentialCache.DefaultCredentials;Di2015NewLine            HttpWebResponse response = (HttpWebResponse)request.GetResponse();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Stream receiveStream = response.GetResponseStream();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            StreamReader readStream = new StreamReader(receiveStream, Encoding.UTF7);Di2015NewLine            String html = readStream.ReadToEnd() + "";Di2015NewLine            int a = html.IndexOf("onmouseout=\\"this.style.backgroundColor='#fff'\\">") + 47;Di2015NewLine            int b = html.IndexOf("</span>",html.IndexOf("onmouseout=\\"this.style.backgroundColor='#fff'\\">") + 47);Di2015NewLine            translated = html.Substring(a, b - a);Di2015NewLine            response.Close();Di2015NewLine            readStream.Close();Di2015NewLine            if (translated.Length < (10 * text.Length))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                translated = translated.Replace("&#39", "'");Di2015NewLine                translated = Regex.Replace(translated, @"[^\\w\\.\\'\\s@-]", "");Di2015NewLine                if (player == Player.Console)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    player.ParseMessage(translated, true);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    player.ParseMessage(translated, false);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                player.Message("Usage: /translate [lang] [message]");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch(Exception ex)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            player.Message("Error:" + ex.ToString());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine

5071084Di2015UniqueSeparatorWM_NCHITTEST
5071084Di2015UniqueSeparatorconst int WM_NCHITTEST = 0x0084;Di2015NewLineconst int HTTRANSPARENT = -1;Di2015NewLineconst int HTCLIENT = 1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//The default hit-test for a TabControl'sDi2015NewLine//background is HTTRANSPARENT, preventingDi2015NewLine//me from receiving mouse and drag eventsDi2015NewLine//over the background.  I catch this and Di2015NewLine//replace HTTRANSPARENT with HTCLIENT to Di2015NewLine//allow the user to drag over us when we Di2015NewLine//have no TabPages.Di2015NewLineprotected override void WndProc(ref Message m) {Di2015NewLine    base.WndProc(ref m);Di2015NewLine    if (m.Msg == WM_NCHITTEST) {Di2015NewLine        if (m.Result.ToInt32() == HTTRANSPARENT)Di2015NewLine            m.Result = new IntPtr(HTCLIENT);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
