5071329Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class MvcApplication : System.Web.HttpApplicationDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    protected void Application_Start()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        GlobalFilters.Filters.Add(new AdSequencePostProcessingFilterAttribute());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
5071329Di2015UniqueSeparatorAdSequencePostProcessingFilterAttribute
5071329Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class AdSequencePostProcessingFilterAttribute : ActionFilterAttributeDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private Stream _output;Di2015NewLine    private const string AdSequenceMarker = ":{ad_sequence}";Di2015NewLine    private const char AdSequenceStart = ':';Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override void OnActionExecuting(ActionExecutingContext filterContext)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //Capture the original output stream;Di2015NewLine        _output = filterContext.HttpContext.Response.Filter;Di2015NewLine        filterContext.HttpContext.Response.Flush();Di2015NewLine        filterContext.HttpContext.Response.Filter = new CapturingResponseFilter(filterContext.HttpContext.Response.Filter);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override void OnResultExecuted(ResultExecutedContext filterContext)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //Get the emitted markupDi2015NewLine        filterContext.HttpContext.Response.Flush();Di2015NewLine        CapturingResponseFilter filter = Di2015NewLine            (CapturingResponseFilter)filterContext.HttpContext.Response.Filter;Di2015NewLine        filterContext.HttpContext.Response.Filter = _output;Di2015NewLine        string html = filter.GetContents(filterContext.HttpContext.Response.ContentEncoding);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Replace the marker string in the markup with incrementing integerDi2015NewLine        int adSequenceCounter = 1;Di2015NewLine        StringBuilder output = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < html.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            char c = html[i];Di2015NewLine            if (c == AdSequenceStart && html.Substring(i, AdSequenceMarker.Length) == AdSequenceMarker)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                output.Append(adSequenceCounter++);Di2015NewLine                i += (AdSequenceMarker.Length - 1);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                output.Append(c);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Write the rewritten markup to the output streamDi2015NewLine        filterContext.HttpContext.Response.Write(output.ToString());Di2015NewLine        filterContext.HttpContext.Response.Flush();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
5071329Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass CapturingResponseFilter : StreamDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private Stream _sink;Di2015NewLine    private MemoryStream mem;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public CapturingResponseFilter(Stream sink)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _sink = sink;Di2015NewLine        mem = new MemoryStream();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // The following members of Stream must be overriden.Di2015NewLine    public override bool CanRead { get { return true; } }Di2015NewLine    public override bool CanSeek  { get { return false; } }Di2015NewLine    public override bool CanWrite { get { return false; } }Di2015NewLine    public override long Length { get { return 0; } }Di2015NewLine    public override long Position { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override long Seek(long offset, SeekOrigin direction)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return 0;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override void SetLength(long length)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _sink.SetLength(length);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override void Close()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _sink.Close();Di2015NewLine        mem.Close();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override void Flush()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _sink.Flush();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override int Read(byte[] buffer, int offset, int count)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return _sink.Read(buffer, offset, count);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Override the Write method to filter Response to a file. Di2015NewLine    public override void Write(byte[] buffer, int offset, int count)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //Here we will not write to the sink b/c we want to captureDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Write out the response to the file.Di2015NewLine        mem.Write(buffer, 0, count);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public string GetContents(Encoding enc)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var buffer = new byte[mem.Length];Di2015NewLine        mem.Position = 0;Di2015NewLine        mem.Read(buffer, 0, buffer.Length);Di2015NewLine        return enc.GetString(buffer, 0, buffer.Length);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

EqualityComparer<TKey>.Default;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override bool Equals(TSource x, TSource y)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (x == null)Di2015NewLine            return (y == null);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (y == null)Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return _keyComparer.Equals(_keySelector(x), _keySelector(y));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override int GetHashCode(TSource obj)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (obj == null)Di2015NewLine           throw new ArgumentNullException("obj");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return _keyComparer.GetHashCode(_keySelector(obj));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5078945Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static void Compress(FileInfo fi)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Get the stream of the source file.Di2015NewLine            using (FileStream inFile = fi.OpenRead())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Prevent compressing hidden and already compressed files.Di2015NewLine                if ((File.GetAttributes(fi.FullName) & FileAttributes.Hidden)Di2015NewLine                    != FileAttributes.Hidden & fi.Extension != ".cmp")Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // Create the compressed file.Di2015NewLine                    using (FileStream outFile =Di2015NewLine                            File.Create(fi.FullName + ".cmp"))Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        using (DeflateStream Compress =Di2015NewLine                            new DeflateStream(outFile,Di2015NewLine                            CompressionMode.Compress))Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            // Copy the source file into Di2015NewLine                            // the compression stream.Di2015NewLine                            byte[] buffer = new byte[4096];Di2015NewLine                            int numRead;Di2015NewLine                            while ((numRead = inFile.Read(buffer,Di2015NewLine                                    0, buffer.Length)) != 0)Di2015NewLine                            {Di2015NewLine                                Compress.Write(buffer, 0, numRead);Di2015NewLine                            }Di2015NewLine                            Console.WriteLine("Compressed {0} from {1} to {2} bytes.",Di2015NewLine                            fi.Name, fi.Length.ToString(), outFile.Length.ToString());Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine

5087990Di2015UniqueSeparatorinterface IFooDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int Age { get; }Di2015NewLine    string Name { get; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineclass Foo : IFooDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public int Age { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public string Name { get; set; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineabstract class ValidatorBase<T>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public class Rule    Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public Func<T, bool> Test { get; set; }Di2015NewLine        public string Message { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected abstract IEnumerable<Rule> Rules { get; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public IEnumerable<string> Validate(T t)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return this.Rules.Where(r => !r.Test(t)).Select(r => r.Message);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass FooValidator : ValidatorBase<IFoo>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    protected override IEnumerable<ValidatorBase<IFoo>.Rule> RulesDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        getDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return new Rule[] {Di2015NewLine                new Rule { Test = new Func<IFoo,bool>(foo => foo.Age >= 0), Message = "Age must be greater than zero" },Di2015NewLine                new Rule { Test = new Func<IFoo,bool>(foo => !string.IsNullOrEmpty(foo.Name)), Message = "Name must be provided" }Di2015NewLine            };                    Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var foos = new[] {Di2015NewLine        new Foo { Name = "Ben", Age = 30 },Di2015NewLine        new Foo { Age = -1 },Di2015NewLine        new Foo { Name = "Dorian Grey", Age = -140 }Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var fooValidator = new FooValidator();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (var foo in foos)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var messages = fooValidator.Validate(foo);Di2015NewLine        if (!messages.Any()) Console.WriteLine("Valid");Di2015NewLine        else foreach (var message in messages) Console.WriteLine("Invalid: " + message);Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

5088566Di2015UniqueSeparatorlibrary Project2;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineusesDi2015NewLine  SysUtils;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine{$R *.res}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinefunction SimpleConv(const s: string): string;Di2015NewLinebeginDi2015NewLine  Result := LowerCase(s);Di2015NewLineend;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinefunction MsgEncode(pIn: PWideChar; out pOut: PWideChar): LongBool; stdcall;Di2015NewLinevarDi2015NewLine  sOut: string;Di2015NewLine  BuffSize: Integer;Di2015NewLinebeginDi2015NewLine  sOut := SimpleConv(pIn);Di2015NewLine  BuffSize := SizeOf(Char)*(Length(sOut)+1);//+1 for null-terminatorDi2015NewLine  GetMem(pOut, BuffSize);Di2015NewLine  FillChar(pOut^, BuffSize, 0);Di2015NewLine  Result := Length(sOut)>0;Di2015NewLine  if Result thenDi2015NewLine    Move(PChar(sOut)^, pOut^, BuffSize);Di2015NewLineend;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprocedure BlockFree(p: Pointer); stdcall;Di2015NewLinebeginDi2015NewLine  FreeMem(p);//safe to call when p=nilDi2015NewLineend;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineexportsDi2015NewLine  MsgEncode,Di2015NewLine  BlockFree;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinebeginDi2015NewLineend.Di2015NewLine

5090095Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static string getChecksum(string sentence)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  //Start with first ItemDi2015NewLine  int checksum= Convert.ToByte(sentence[sentence.IndexOf('$')+1]);Di2015NewLine  // Loop through all chars to get a checksumDi2015NewLine  for (int i=sentence.IndexOf('$')+2 ; i<sentence.IndexOf('*') ; i++)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    // No. XOR the checksum with this character's valueDi2015NewLine    checksum^=Convert.ToByte(sentence[i]);              Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  // Return the checksum formatted as a two-character hexadecimalDi2015NewLine  return checksum.ToString("X2");Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
